reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
review_body:
First I want to be clear on why I'm giving it 4 stars, this scent is just not for me. Im new to fragrances and still young, but I saw some awesome reviews on this so I made the purchase.

The scent itself is very nice, and great quality. Im not great at being able to tell "nodes" apart or identify certain smells, but with this one I smell honey, and tobacco, very strongly. I would say this is an old mans fragrance.

Im prefer colognes like YSL L'homme and Versache Eros, because they semll clean, fresh, and young. I feel like 18.21 smells too old man like and not really my style at this point in life.

That said, if you are an older guy and looking for this kind of scent, this one's probably the best quality on the market. Even though its not my style, I can recognize that it smells very good and performs well.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2022
review_body:
As a tobacco cologne I did wish to smell a lot more. The honey scent at the very beginning of its life is extremely strong! I like the dry down a lot more than the very beginning. I have used Villain from Pete and Pedro and that is more of what I was expecting. Don‚Äôt get me wrong this cologne is amazing! It is not intimidating but give you more of an approachable scent. The villain label from Pete and Pedro has a very Aromac scent that gives off a kick in the face of high quality cigar tobacco throughout the entire life of the cologne. The notes of vanilla in it are immaculate. This has more of a pipe tobacco scent with a strong aroma of honey at the beginning but fades into a nice smooth scent.

Now this would be an every day wear for me if it wasn‚Äôt so expensive. Villan is only a $50 bottle and the scent is more of a fancy event for me but once again since it is so cheap I wear it a lot! This sweet tobacco spirits would be my daily wearer if it wasn‚Äôt a 80-90$$ bottle. Although the opening comes out as a very strong honey aroma. The drydown gives you a very smooth smell of tobacco and I am okay with that. The only recommendation I could make on this cologne would to be reduce the honey and add in some vanilla notes. Other than that, it is a great cologne! Do not be afraid to try it out!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2016
reviewer_title: Great Quality & The def. Of A Masculine Cologne.
review_body:
This scent was Heavy on the Honey and in my opinion for a much older gentleman but thats a little subjective.
However , what is absolute is that this is one of the finest quality fragrances I have ever had the chance to get my nose on.

Just because I feel it doesn't fit my personality or age doesn't mean this isn't a top shelf scent.

I can tell that it was crafted with care like a well tailored suit. It had the right amount of tobacco but for me it was hidden under the honey note which lasted a long time on my skin . Now because of the honey I can see how some women could try to pull this off as a unisex especially if they are outspoken and bold personality type yet, I think this is more of a man scent and I would not recommend for a woman.

It is not a sweet scent like Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille and it is not as harsh like a Havana by Thierry Mugler Havane.

It reminded me of Tom Ford's Tobacco Vanille just not as sweet and this has a dry tabaco scent to it. It also reminds me a little of L'Instant de Guerlain pour Homme Just add tobacco but It is, its on master piece ,the very def. of a masculine cologne ,and I was very impressed I just don't think it was for me but who knows I may give it another try sometime down the line.

If you like these fragrances you will love this.
L'Instant de Guerlain pour Homme
L'Instant de Guerlain pour Homme Intense
Thierry mugler havane.
1 Million
Dior Homme Intense
Tabacco Absolute

18:21 has an $80 price tag which should be atlest $180. I can see this in a year or 2 being hard to find and considered niche.
Get your while you can.

P.S. To the company I would love to see other fragrances maybe some citrus Frag.
and a ladies Version of the Tobacco Spirit. I am sure it will sale.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2017
review_body:
If I could give more than 5 stars I would. I'm more then pleased with this product, but more so pleased with the customer service. Had an issue and they promptly took care of my issue. Their customer service is something other companies should take a look at. They listen to feedback and stand behind their products. What more could you ask for?! As for this product, it lasts ALL day on me! After showering, my wife tells me that she can still smell it or asks if I just put on some cologne. This is coming from someone who is not yet in their 30's, but considers themselves a connoisseur when it comes to things like this. This juice here, is pure quality. And made here in the USA. Not many are nowadays. None that I can think of. As for the scent, I get a good dose of honey upfront and throughout the scent. Nothing too sweet, but just right. This seems to be sitting along with the whiskey note, which I really don't like in fragrances because usually it is too strong, smells of a old man, or just ruins it for me. This, is perfection to me. Everything seems to be in perfect moderation to where it is not too much of anything, but just enough of what is needed. And believe me, a little goes a long way! And now with this being sold directly from the distributor, you don't have to concern yourself with wondering if it's a new batch or an old one. Or if it was properly stored. The bottles have also been revamped for those who may have faced issues with it before. So in conclusion, get it while you can. Good things come and go in life so make sure you take your opportunity when it presents itself!

Thanks!

reviewer_title: It is awesome, I kept reading the reviews on YouTube and ...
review_body: Guys, You nailed it on this Cologne, It is awesome, I kept reading the reviews on YouTube and finally decided I had to hurry up and get a bottle of this for myself, the anticipation waiting for this to arrive was so exciting, just like Christmas all over again, was a bit nervous when it arrived as I know you had a little problem with some leakage in some bottles but I know the response from you was that you had the problem fixed and I was happy to see it is and my bottle was exactly what I was hoping for, the box it came in is definitely a masterpiece and the bottle itself is the same, I am wearing this right now and have had several compliments in the short time I have had it, I carry the bottle in one of the inside coat pockets when I go out so if someone compliments me on it I take it out and show them the bottle and let them try it and at least 3 of my friends just last week said they are getting an order out right away for this awesome mens cologne, I am new to the Cologne collecting hobby and have probably 23 different colognes and this as of now is my top choice, and I have Bleu De Channel-Dolce @ Gabbana the One-TerreD'Hermes and many more that are rated very high by many people but in my opinion 18.21 Man Made Sweet Tobacco Spirits is on the top of my list. Thank You very much for the work all of you put into this beautiful product, you have a lifetime Customer. Richard Sanvick

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2022
review_body: I was introduced to 18.21 cologne by BirchBox a couple years ago. While the scent ‚ÄúSweet Tobacco‚Äù sounds odd it is my favorite smelling cologne so far and smells unique when compared to others. I mostly get compliments on it while occasionally get told that it comes off very musky. My only minor complaint is that I wish it lasted longer but I feel like this is a problem with almost all colognes in my experience. I use this in combination with their body lotion to keep the scent lasting longer. Really like it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2017
reviewer_title: ... I'm going to compare it to three of my favorite colognes currently
review_body:
I just received this product and I'm going to compare it to three of my favorite colognes currently.

A) Cigar (Remy Latour)
B) By The Fireplace (Replica)
C) Jazz Club (Replica)

A) Hands down for me, Cigar is incredible. It's masculine, sexy, and very timeless. It's got a tobacco scent to it but in a way that's not obvious. You can wear this during any season but best when it's cooler.

B) By The Fireplace is the most gorgeous smoky sweet scent I've ever come across. It puts Tom Ford Oud, Mugler Havane, etc to shame (they smell absolutely horrendous IMO). It's pricey at $126 for a bottle but well worth it if you want something truly smells smokey and sweet. DEFINITELY a colder weather scent.

C) Jazz Club is an incredible scent that reminds you of leather, Manhattans, and a touch of cigars. Great silage - definitely a winter scent.

So I sprayed 18.21 on me and took note of what I smelled as the time passed by. Initially it's incredibly sweet...overpowering scents of honey and vanilla. As time passed, it turned into a more cigar leaf scent but one that's been dipped in honey or something sweet. It doesn't have earthy tones like Cigar does. As even more time passes by, the scent becomes very tobacco-ish.

Definitely a nice scent but the sweetness still remains and is somewhat overpowering for me. Not what I expected. If the sweetness was toned down a bit...maybe by a half, this would be an excellent scent because it has so many layers as time passes by.

For now I'm not a real fan. But I'll try it a couple of times to see. If it doesn't work out, it's a gift.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2017
reviewer_title: Nothing like sweet tobacco and booze
review_body: I had only smelled this fragrance as the combination of scents in my grandfather's old-school barber shop. So this was a blind buy for me. It took me back to the old bald barber lathering my grandfather's face and shaving it with the straight razor, which he sharpened on a long leather strap hanging from the side of the barber chair. There is the man smoking a pipe outside the door of the shop. The smell of the shaving cream, the leather strap, the pipe smoke, the talcum powder he would apply with a large brush and the bay rum aftershave...all of that is in this bottle. There is the tobacco, also the bare essence of vanilla or tonka bean under it all. Sweet Tobacco Spirits is a grown up fragrance for men who remember a simpler time. It transports me back there. This scent is distinctive and boozy. I can't smell it after an hour but anyone within 5 feet still can for at least another 4 hours. Love it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2019
review_body:
The Scent: I really don‚Äôt get any tobacco here at all. It‚Äôs just a boozy vanilla (probably bourbon vanilla) run amuck. If there was an actual tobacco note this would be one of the greatest frags of all time. Seriously, it would have given D&G‚Äôs The One a run for it‚Äôs money especially since performance is so good. But alas, it falls in the ‚Äòreally good but not great‚Äô category for me.

Performance: The longevity on this is above average and so is projection so go easy on the trigger. Definitely a cool weather scent that leans nighttime but I think you could pull this off in daytime as well, especially on the coldest days of winter.

Presentation: Nothing but love here. The bottle and cap are dead sexy and the atomizer is outstanding. Honestly the atomizer is nearly as good as a Dior atomizer, yeah, that kind of outstanding.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
review_body: The scent is fantastic, it last a long time and correspondingly it's worth every dime! It goes very well with the mens body wash of the same name. Two thumbs all the way up!!!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2021
review_body: I like 18.21 products. This is a good size bottle for the price. It is kind of a weak effeminate smell compared to their other more manly scented stuff. I get zero compliments at home or at work when I wear it. That is neither bad nor good. When I wear Fahrenheit by Christian Dior, heads turn, but you don't always want to do that as it would lose its effect, or you at least want to mix it up some. This is not a mix it up or a head turn. It smells like you spilled honey on yourself, and is flowery. Not the vanilla, rum, tobacco type scent from 18.21's other products.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2018
reviewer_title: Don't be turned off by the sweet smell and don't be afraid to blindly purchase this like I did. :)
review_body: Normally one shouldn't blindly buy cologne/perfume, but I took a gamble, seeing as it was recommended and most of the reviews were very favorable. Unlike some other reviewers, my package fortunately did not leak during shipment and I was very surprised as how much fluid was in the bottle. The stock picture truly doesn't do justice as to how big the package is. Anyways, onto the review. It has a very sweet smell like honey but don't be alarmed. The saccharine smell mellows out greatly over the course of the day and has a faint blend of tobacco and honey. I haven't had the chance of others noticing the smell and commenting on it directly, but I did notice some people making extra passes at me when I talked to them. I don't expect to pick up girls or anything like that with using this, but I really do like how the cologne and the intoxicating smell is making me a bit more self-confident in myself. Maybe I'll report an update in a couple months to see how using this affects my daily life.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2017
review_body: I bought this for my husband as a less-expensive substitute for Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille, which he loves. He likes this just as much, although it is not quite exactly the same scent. It is similar, but with a little bit of a leathery smell added in. At first it smells very spicy and leathery (like a cross between Tom Ford Tobacco Vanille and Spicebomb by Victor &Rolf), but as it wears on and the top notes fade, it turns into a sweeter, rich vanilla scent similar to Calvin Kline's Obsession for men, but not as pungent and musky. It is not something you smell everyday, and my husband prefers a sofisticated, mature, masculine scent like this one. But most importantly....I am a woman and I like it too. It smells great on him. I read reviews that complained about the packaging/bottle/spray pump...our arrived in perfect condition, no leaks, no problems. Great product/ good value

reviewer_title: Manly smell and not too strong
review_body: Amazing scent. Sweet tobacco flavor is rich and authentic

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2022
review_body: I rarely write reviews, but I‚Äôm hoping to make the next person think twice about blindly spending $80 on something that sells more like baby powder than the 18.21 shampoo. The shampoo smells amazing. However the cologne is not a match. It has similar notes, but clearly there‚Äôs additional scents added in, which I found to be overwhelming. The overall aroma isn‚Äôt bad, but it‚Äôs strong and to me smells like something an older lady would wear. The scent wears off quickly than my other colognes. Unfortunately I wasn‚Äôt able to return this. The good news, at least it didn‚Äôt leak in the box.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2023
review_body: Good smelling stuff.....mild, masculine, sweet aroma

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2019
review_body:
I've owned this for about a year now. Worn it a lot. Smells like sweet honey/vanilla pipe tobacco. It's not complicated but still feels sophisticated. This is a performance monster. You will smell this on you in the morning. It is great but not offensive projection. If you like "Back to Black" by Killian (some say "Light My Fire" by Killian but I do not think they are as similar), this runs in the same circles. It is not a clone, and it isn't nearly as complex, but that lack of complexity is really this fragrances identity.

As soon as the leaves start turning it is time to wear this. Its a warm sensual scent that not a lot of people are wearing. If you are a mad-person you can wear it when its warm outside, but I wouldn't. Price has already increased from when I bought my first two bottles.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2022
review_body: Tired of fancy and expensive cologne. But this one is just so unique. Once you start using it, you‚Äôll never use other cologne. This tops them all. I even use it when I‚Äôm home that‚Äôs how good it is. I‚Äôll never buy other cologne. I like it!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2022
review_body:
I don't know why 99% of "tobacco" colognes have too much vanilla and cinnamon in them... its way sweeter smelling than the shampoo - which I love.

I picked this up because I love the scent of the shampoo... but this comes off as either too vanilla-ish or too cinnamon spiced. I've had people say I smell "clean" and some say that it reminds them of Cinnabar perfume. Not a single person thought it smelled like tobacco or particularly manly.

Maybe it's just my body chemistry, but if you're looking for a tobacco scent, this ain't it.

Overall super disappointed with this for the price to expectations.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2017
review_body:
The price is high for a reason. It had a smell that is very difficult to find anywhere else. It you went to be the memorable guy who smells great this is the one. I've had women who are complete strangers compliment on the smell of this cologne. Be very careful to not over due it though. I spray it directly on my chest and neck when I get out of the shower just after drying off (yes, that's the secret). Get this cologne in your pores when they're open, that way if you start to perspire it opens your pores and you smell amazing! Two sprays goes a long way gentleman. BTW, the hair paste works awesome and smells the same too. My advice is to apply that when your hair is still just a smidgen wet, run it in good and style and it'll be good to go.

_cheers

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2022
review_body: First of all, I loved the smell of the shower gel I bought, so I ordered the bottle of cologne... I was very surprised at the large sized of the bottle, then I sprayed it on my arm and was instantly satisfied with how fresh and clean the smell is .... thank you, I believe I have found my smell.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2016
reviewer_title: Quality Formulation For Men Who Appreciate Fragrances
review_body: The difference to me in 'LOVING' and 'LIKING' a product like this is the lasting value of the fragrance on my skin and its lasting balance of base and fragrances in the bottle. At $80. plus tax and shipping this is probably not an impulse purchase. I own and use other high end, fragrance-enhanced toiletries (and they don't reach this price level) but this one does seem to be worth the price. The 'tobacco leaf' scent lasts a full 24 hours-plus (I wasn't sweating during this test), the product doesn't sting the skin of a normally sensitive (or 'insensitive?') person; and the description of 'sweet' paired with 'tobacco' is 'spot-on.' The 'sweet' notes here remind me of a sugary rum. They fade as the product dries on the skin. My advice: put it on about a half-hour before you aim to impress anyone and things come into a finely appreciated balance.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2022
review_body: The best smelling cologne I've ever bought. Women love it. Had multiple compliments on it. Wish they'd drop the price about 10 bucks

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2016
review_body:
My rating for the fragrance would be undoubtedly 5 stars.

Manufacturing and quality control 2 stars.

Fragrance is absolutely amazing. Smells like a cross between Killian Back to Black and Tobacco Vanille. Amazing value for money. Very natural, high quality and garners compliments.

First bottle was received with a loose cap and 25% of the juice missing and soaked into packaging. Amazon quickly sent me a replacement bottle and this one was even worse. The sprayer was crooked, a little over half the juice leaked out on arrival. Both boxes were in good shape so leads me to think it may be a manufacturer/quality control issue.

Between the two faulty bottles I've got a little over 100ml, which is enough to last me a while because this stuff performs well. Unfortunately I have to very carefully store upright and can't travel with it. Even a little tip of the bottle leads to a hand/floor full of fragrance. The bathroom smells of this so I think it may be evaporating out of the bottle.

The fragrance is amazing, just wish the bottle was more durable to better facilitate storage, use and travel.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2021
reviewer_title: Scent is nice for a while
review_body: I've searched for colognes that smell like pipe tobacco, and found that this one probably comes the closest. It's sweet and musky. Of course, the scent changes over time, and by the end of the day, I can smell more of a powdery undernote. Still, it's a great scent for several hours. Put a little in your beard and see.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2022
review_body: a Cigar smells better first lit thanthis to me. Not for me

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2022
review_body:
I like it a lot people come up and tell me I smell great
And I tell them what it is

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
review_body: Love every product from 18.21. Highly recommended.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2017
review_body: I bought this fragrance blind based on reviews and the general buzz about the product. It was a big risk for me because I'm very particular about what I wear. But I was in the market for just this type of fragrance so I decided to give it a shot. I'm so glad I did! It absolutely lives up to everything I've heard about it. I won't call it height be just this type of fragrance so I decided to give it a shot. I'm so glad I did! It absolutely lives up to everything I've heard about it. I'm not a fragrance reviewer so I won't try to get into anything technical. But for me sweet tobacco spirits is an absolute masterpiece! I think if you're considering buying it blind, but you're hesitant, you should go for it. I do not think you'll be disappointed.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2016
reviewer_title: Let's start by saying the scent is awesome, very manly and masculine
review_body: Let's start by saying the scent is awesome, very manly and masculine. I have a lot of colognes but this one stands alone. The first time I put it on after a shower with a small spritz on my chest, I was very pleased with the smell, about 5 minutes later my wife came in as she smelled me from the bedroom, she Said "mmmmmm, You smell sexy"! she rarely ever comments on my colognes other than to say she doesn't like one smell or the other. This seems to have pretty good staying power as I have had people ask what I am wearing later in the day 8-10 hours after application. I would highly recommend this this has a nice mature tobacco, spicy scent. Not a kiddy cologne but a great manly cologne. Try it, you will love it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2020
review_body: One squirt lasts forever!!! As soon as I sprayed it on myself my wife was all over me. No joke. If you like to smell like a mans man. Like I do. I work in the oilfield and am tired of smelling these asshats with their gergio armani and their other smells. I wanna smell like a man should and this scent is perfect. It smells like vanilla tobacco and wood. Idk what everyone else thinks and don't care. I wore it out to the store and to eat with family and everyone was asking what I was wearing cause it smelt amazing. Try it. If ya don't like it send it to me.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2022
review_body:
bought this for my husband, he loves it and so do I !
It's very different , not your typical woodsy men's cologne. It has a sweet tobacco fragrance. Its unique

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on February 29, 2020
review_body:
I absolutely love personal fragrance and I am always looking for my next fragrance obsession, well this one could be it!! This has the most wonderful smooth honied vanilla tobacco scent that lasts all day. I think it is a super sexy fragrance for a man. I like that it is very different from most male fragrances. This one will totally make you smell like a distinguished gentlemen from a time gone by. For the scent and fragrance longevity, totally worth the money.
As a fragrance tip, layer this fragrance with a simple vanilla body spray and seriously turn heads when you go out!!!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2022
review_body: This scent had the ladies all over me, it‚Äôs perfect in so many ways.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2016
reviewer_title: Smells exactly like Sweet Tobacco, EXACTLY.
review_body: So I was getting some different colognes trying to find something that I like and my girlfriend likes. She is kind of over the citrus, pine or sport scents so I thought I would give this a try. When I first put it on I was like oh crap I smell like I just swam through a flooded tobacco shop with a sickly sweet scent of honey tobacco on me. I was not a fan at all, however my girlfriend loves it and it's her favorite cologne on me now so it has grown on me and I have gotten other complements from it. I am going with 5 stars because it may not be my favorite cologne but I bought it so my girlfriend would be happy and that is mission accomplished.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on February 26, 2017
reviewer_title: Its alright but the hype around it is not justified
review_body:
There is a lot of hype among people who love fragrances for this one.
I decided to dive in for this fragrance that began its life as a $30 fragrance. And shot up to $80 after the demands skyrocketted.
While others might tell you about its boozy quality and all that, it just did not work for me. It was too dense and you drown in it. It was strictly ok.
It does not receive great compliments like Designer/niche fragrances I've worn in similar settings..
Yes it is different but the boozy note makes you a little nauseous. it suppresses/subdues the other notes for me.

Is it just me who feels that way? no... hit reddit and you will find several others trying to get rid of their bottles with the same opinion.
Is it different and interesting for a sniff or two? yes

This might work in much cooler climes.
I like it, do not love it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2021
reviewer_title: I don‚Äôt understand why $80. I smell $10 at best
review_body:
To me, the scent is not bad, it‚Äôs definitely not great. I expected smooth and subtle, tobacco, vanilla, bourbon scent.
It is a powerful tobacco bourbon scent. You can begin to pick up the best notes about 30min after your sniffer recovers from just 1 spray to chest area.
I would value this around $10 to $15. $80 is outrageous.
I would not recommend

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2020
reviewer_title: Not quite Tom Ford, but impressive in it's own right
review_body:
Good fragrance that smells high class.. However, Tom Ford Tabacco Vanile is in a whole different league when it comes to projection and longevity (I own both).
I rate this fragrance in between traditional designer fragrances (Givenchy,Polo etc) in terms of quality but it's not on the level of niche houses like TF and Creed.
Overall, nice mid/upper level juice.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
review_body: I get a lot of compliments on this. Thanks Kevin Samuels for the recommendation RIP.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2021
reviewer_title: Don't miss out on the best selling sent ever.
review_body: Well worth the money, the scent on this product is the most professional I have ever come across. I really love the fresh clean mild scent that comes from this product and so do the women. The scent last for ever so you don't have to worry about reapplying it one or two sprays is all it takes.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2019
reviewer_title: For the price, this is a more wearable, more enjoyable "Tobacco Vanille"
review_body: These scents are quite a (stunningly) similar duo... Personally, TF TV is more potent, but in ways that makes it overbearing and too cloyingly sweet. This is a lighter, more honey-tinged version of the same vibe. Bought blind and hesitant, but this is pretty good! I recently let a large decanter of TV go, & I'll enjoy this far more easily, in far more situations... It's simply the more wearable version of the same thing, if not a little better in the sense of being more of a general "crowd pleaser"... At a better price by far, as well. A+

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2022
review_body: I really enjoy this fragrance and I'm a big niche parfum guy. I was pleasantly surprised!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2016
review_body: This smells so wonderful -- I can't stop sniffing. I tried a sample and couldn't stop thinking about it; was thrilled to find it here on amazon. The scent is powdery and sweet and smoky and cozy. It is so perfect for fall. Its very sweet, with lots of honey, so I think it works for women as well as men. Sillage is initially somewhat strong, but not at all overwhelming. Longevity is so-so. To me, this is more of a play scent than a serious wear-to-work scent, but oh I love it. I'm sure I'll be purchasing another bottle down the road.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2016
reviewer_title: Subtle long lasting masculinity in a bottle. Great customer service!
review_body: I absolutely love the smell it's not over powering. It kind of reminds me of a really classy bar. I don't find the honey to be too strong. This is a masculine classy scent. The only problem is that 15 percent of my bottle leaked and I'm too disabled to send it back. I wish they would send me a gift card or a discount on one of their products. I'm just afraid if I send it back the next bottle will leak more. I still have to give it 5 stars because the leak is a packaging problem. Their customer service is the best I've ever seen. They went above and beyond to fix my problem.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2023
reviewer_title: Only good thing I can say it is long lasting.
review_body: I read nearly all the reviews & since I love the sweet scents of a good pipe I thought I would love this. First this scent is very strong. It is about to make me sick and it is not even used. The box is so smelly!!! The room is still stinking, I had my hubby take it to near the back door. I can‚Äôt get the smell out of my nose. Oh, also while the Amazon shipping box was perfect the box the bottle was in had the paper stamped seal broken. It is 42 degrees outside, but I think I will have to crack a window. I have always loved the smell of a man with the soft sweet smell of a pipe, so I thought I would love this. The bottle we got was not this. Getting a refund.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2018
review_body: I got this for my husband and boy does it smell good. It smells so intoxicating on him, I almost don't want to let him out of my sight! He sprays this on in the morning before work and when he comes home, he still smells just as good, this stuff is long lasting that's for sure. I would say this is the best smelling cologne he's ever had and we've been together a long time. Ladies, you need to get this for your man. Dudes, you need to get this to smell good for your wife or to pick up chicks.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2020
review_body: This is a fantastic, cold weather cologne. The projection, the sillage, and the scent itself are all...off the charts. Buyer beware, though, that this cologne is not for everyone! If you're looking for a warm-weather fragrance, something light, fresh, or unisex, you'll be disappointed. However, for those men who want a truly masculine cologne that has a very unique scent profile, this cologne is for you. The smell of sweet pipe tobacco, rich honey, vanilla, and whiskey are combined in perfect harmony to produce a signature scent ideal for the winter months.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2020
reviewer_title: Just pull the trigger, you'll be glad you did.
review_body:
Gotta say I was on the fence spending this much for a sent I hadn't smelled. Went off reviews and aroma profile.
I now have a new favorite. Love the sent. Seems to hang around a while, which I love. Nothing worse than it being gone 10 min after you spray like most.
18.21, more sents please, same quality. Keep up the good work!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2018
review_body:
After I have had this for not quite a year, I am cutting back my stars to three, really big hype to this first off. It does last for at least 8 hrs. I remember a reviewer mentioned smelling like "burning plastic" couldn't figure that one out until I opened it for the first time. And thats exactly what I smelled, doesn't mean its awful. Just that is does in fact remind me of that particular smell, no tobacco smell at all that I can sense.
But you do smell a honey type scent, is it worth it for the price ? Nope, would not buy again based on that "odd" smell. Price wise I would pay about $40.00 max

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2021
reviewer_title: Don‚Äôt let the price scare you. It‚Äôs worth it!
review_body: Don‚Äôt let the price scare you. It‚Äôs definitely worth it. It smells great and the smell last all day and then some. I get compliments all the time when I wear it and that‚Äôs with 6 feet of social distancing and wearing a mask! Imagine if they could get closer! You won‚Äôt regret spending the money on this product.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
review_body: This has to be some knockoff version because it smells NOTHING like the actual version! Would like my money back or replaced with the actual cologne I paid for and ordered

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2021
review_body: This scent is very long lasting and projects very well. What I don‚Äôt like is that it is too sweet for me. All I get is a honey scent, no tobacco at all. In my opinion it is a good scent for a women.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2019
review_body:
Once again, I‚Äôm tricked into a purchase due to hype. This is not a terrible cologne, just not as good as the hype. All I get is the honey, and some vanilla. Not unpleasant, but not as great as people say. But with all fragrances, it smells different on other people‚Äôs skin.

I get honey and some vanilla. Others have stated they get a boozy smell (which I would‚Äôve liked), and a tobacco smell, I really get neither. I get a boozy smell from the body wash, which I actually prefer over the cologne.

Overall, not horrible, but not something that is mind blowing for me, definitely a disappointment.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2018
reviewer_title: The cologne is actually perfect. The tobacco and subtle sweetness that accompanies the ...
review_body:
The product is 5/5 stars
The bottle is leaking out of the top so I have to deduct 2 stars.
The cologne is actually perfect. The tobacco and subtle sweetness that accompanies the tobacco is sublime. I'm a huge fan of tobacco and my only complaint is that the sweetness starts out a bit over bearing.
The sillage is a 10/10. It projects nicely. I allowed a co worker to try it and after hed touched something I smelled the cologne for hours after in the room.
Longevity is a 10/10. Lasts through the night. Yes I'm one of those weirdos who puts on cologne before bed to smell myself.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2016
reviewer_title: Scent smells great. Better tobacco fragrance than Pure Havane
review_body:
Scent smells great. Better tobacco fragrance than Pure Havane.

I am reducing one star because price was more than doubled after it gained popularity, and because my bottle arrived with a lot of the juice spilled. The atomizer isn't sealing the bottle right, and I had to use plumbers tape and hot glue to seal the 2/3rds that did not spill.

If this fragrance was being sold at $40 like it used to, I would buy another bottle to replace my damaged one.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2016
reviewer_title: I really do love this scent.
review_body:
this smells fantastic!
I did have an issue with the bottle having leaked during transit. The company has worked with me to determine where the leak came from and ultimately decided to replace the bottle.

the scent lasts all day, and i can still smell it the next morning before a shower. It won't be strong after 20 hrs, but still.. i wouldn't expect it to be.

At first spray the cologne has a very plastic and somewhat offensive smell. Once it settles into your skin and warms up it sweetens. It isn't too sweet, and has a very complex profile.

I really do love this scent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2019
reviewer_title: The best mens cologne in existence
review_body: Smells exactly like pipe tobacco - deep and earthy with a rich, subtle sweetness. This cologne last ALL day. This is the 4th bottle I've purchased for my husband as he refuses to wear anything else since the first time he tried it. Everyone compliments this cologne - men, women, even children comment and ask about it. It's his signature smell now, when friends come over they want to get close to him just to smell him. Sometimes I think they come over just to smell him.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2020
review_body: My wife loves it. 2 sprays... its subtle enough to where the only ones who smell it are the ones close to you. you're not going to stink up the whole room!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 4, 2023
reviewer_title: This does not smell like the hair products do and can't be returned.
review_body: I purchased the cologne because I use the hair product that has the same scent. I really like the smell of their hair products, so I decided to order the cologne. That was a mistake, it does not smell like the hair product, and I would not wear this at all. It actually gave me a headache when I smelled it. FYI, this is unable to be returned so be aware. I did not realize that when I purchased this.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2018
reviewer_title: Sweet Tobacco. Perfect. also, as gender neutral.
review_body:
Sweet tobacco. I'm a 33 year old man and find that many people compliment me on this fragrance. But, I believe it would smell equally as wonderful on a person of any gender.

If you like the smell of the 18.21 Pomade this is the same fragrance, and maybe it's just me, but it does smell slightly sweeter when I wear it as cologne than pomade in my hair. Could have to do with my body chemistry and skin.

Clearly I like it and I'd get it again.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2021
review_body: Highly recommend this for something totally different and superior to any other complete line of scented products. This vanilla spice is the definition of ME. Sweet with just the right amount of manly spice. Need it in a lotion and shaving cream.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2022
reviewer_title: I almost want to seduce myself when I apply it damn
review_body: The title is a joke of course, but man women love to ask what I have on. It's unmistakable masculine and doesn't go unnoticed

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2017
reviewer_title: ... you are lookkng for a cologne that wont smell like a teenage movie
review_body: If you are lookkng for a cologne that wont smell like a teenage movie, this is it. It changes through out the day as it's works with your bodies heat and natural oils. I started off with the paste and the body wash for my husband when I saw it for sale at my local beauty salon. I bought the cologne as a Christmas stocking stuffer. I have branded this as my husband's scent. So many women have asked what does he wear and I will never tell. Love the products. Keep up the great work.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2022
review_body: Smells amazing.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2020
reviewer_title: Fantastic scent at a nice price.
review_body: This has become my new winter staple! Boozy wine note, sweet honeyed fruits. Lots of vanilla and tonka. Has a character like many tobacco fragrances I've smelled but no tobacco note... Odd. It smells way more expensive than it is and the performance is killer. The fairer sex seems to enjoy it too. I wouldn't say this is for everyone but if you like bold and different, I say pull the trigger.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 8, 2016
reviewer_title: Not bad at all first when I used it I was ...
review_body: Not bad at all first when I used it I was like what was I thinking and same thing goes for the body wash but after couple of minutes everyone ask where did u buy that.and I was like fewwwww.... good thing my money didn't go to waste after all said everyone seems to like it.but as for me it was decent not the best but not the worst either.will I order these products again it's more like a mood thing with this one.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2019
reviewer_title: I like it....but my kids say it smells like an old man
review_body:
I like this scent and it does have a long lasting smell. It doesn't take much as the scent is very concentrated.
My kiddos says it smells like an old man...but it reminds me of a high class New York speakeasy or fancy hotel.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2017
reviewer_title: At first I was like... but then I was like..
review_body:
Does this smell like an Indian railcar on a hot day when you first apply?
Absolutely!...but like any formidable male musk, similar to those made by Odeon, it stings the nostrils upon entry, evoking a strong mix of hippie and circus animal. After all, it's made with real bits of fermented tobacco, so it's illegal for minors to wear. But after cooling off, it's pungence fades into something truly remarkable, similar to London Gentleman or Blackbeard's Delight. I always grab this some of the time when it's time to musk up.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2017
review_body:
As others have noted, the bottle will leak a little during shipping. I think this is because the cap is not deep enough for the neck of the bottle so any pressure applied to the top of the cap will cause it to spray a little.

Love the cologne though. It's a nice addition to my smell good collection. Smells strong at application but strikes the right notes quickly and stays with you throughout the day. Smells so good it will drop panties at an effective 50 yard range. Possibly 75 depending on the wind.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2019
review_body: This cologne smells great and lasts all day. I have been using the 18.21 cologne for a couple of weeks and really like it. The smell isn't overpowering and anyone who has smelled it seems to like it. You can spay it on in the morning and the fragrance will still there 10 hours later. Something you should buy if you want a nice, sweet, and smooth all-day scent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2019
review_body: My bottle was leaking,probably lost around 10ml. Other then that i like this scent alot. This is my second bottle not sure if they reformulated this. My first bottle seem to be alot stronger then this new one I just got.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2019
review_body: I am a huge fan of this scent, and women have given me compliments on it. Obviously it is a tobacco fragrance, but like others have mentioned, it has a very sweet scent reminiscent of honey. I recently also bought another tobacco fragrance which I also like, but this one is clearly the winner. I use it when I‚Äôm going nowhere just to smell it myself.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2018
reviewer_title: Smells good, not really tobacco in my opinion
review_body: Smells good, not really tobacco in my opinion, but good anyway. I think it's just a little too gourmand, fine the sweetness down a bit and it would be 5 star. I was looking for a tobacco cologne. I really enjoy Tobacco Oud Intense, this is not it, but it is decent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2018
review_body: Great stuff. A little on the sweet side almost a little perfumy but. Last a long time which i like. I combine another scent to it to tone down the sweet smell. Also the bottle leaked a little on it's way to me, that was a concern of mine from reading the reviews about that issue.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2017
reviewer_title: WOW what an incredible cologne ... Worth waiting for!
review_body:
I was bored and surfing the Amazon site ... I found another product I thought I might be interested in.
Reading the feedback on this other product I happened upon a comment about 18.21.
I researched 18.21 and thought it might be something I would like.
Supposed to be similar to Kilian Back to Black ... one of my top five colognes!
Well, 18.21 arrived ... BAMM this is an instant top five cologne!
Seriously, Man Made 18.21 competes with Amouage, Creed, Tauer, Versace ... TOP FIVE!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2017
review_body: Sick fragrance. So glad I bought a bottle. Take this as a hint let one spray out the first time you use it because I got a blast of oil. I cant describe the way this smells other than pure awesomness!!! My wife instantaneously said wow I like that!!! Worth every penny. It came perferctly packaged and unlike some past reviews it had zero leaks. You only need 1 or 2 sprays max otherwise you will clear a room with this. It is a strong but smooth fragrance!!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2016
reviewer_title: People were saying they loved it. So
review_body: I was leery about buying a fragrance online, without smelling it, based on other reviews. People were saying they loved it. So...I bit the bullet and bought it. I love it. The only thing I dont love is it does not stay on as long as I'd hope for the price. But I've got every one from my mother in law to people at work, to cashiers telling me they love it. One lady described it like she thought i just left a hooka shop. bottle leaks so just be careful.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021
review_body: I've gotten a lot of compliments with this stuff. I wear it in the summer and it will work in the winter. The godfather was right once again.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2018
reviewer_title: Very nice scent, different than expected, but not unpleasant.
review_body: Very nice smelling cologne. Reminds me of vanilla and baking spice, but balanced with warmth of cigar/hardwood smoke. It is more subtle and approachable than the name suggests. Projection is so-so, longevity is great. I can still smell on my person after 12 hours. Great for fall/winter or cool evenings.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2016
review_body: Omg, do we love this cologne! I bought my husband first the body wash, and we both love it! I try not to use it, as it's his, but he washes me with it when we get the chance to shower together! Such a warm sexy smell, but it's also very luxurious and sudsy! We'd both recommend using it. I ordered the cologne for him for Christmas, and we both also love it, although I don't wear it. We recommend to everyone. Don't hesitate, buy them both and surprise your man!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2019
review_body: Got it, tried it, liked it. Nice cologne, smells good, doesn't last all that long though. Its not overpowering but not real subtle either when it first goes on. Overall a nice fragrance.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2020
review_body: Scent is just as expected. I purchased the pomade as well so I knew the cologne would be just as good. No complaints . The shipment arrived a day later but honestly after thinking about it? with the weather event we had the last 24 hours it wasn‚Äôt the carriers fault. Great product... great service... Would continue to order

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2021
review_body: There is something about this scent that is different than all my other colognes. Very unique and have received compliments on the way I smell.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2019
review_body:
I would have given five stars but the price took a star away.

Great fragrance, long lasting, not overpowering.

I hope I can find the same amount at a lesser price, because I would love to have more.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2016
review_body:
Without question a true surprise!! Between the combination of tobacco, honey and a variety of other ingredients this most certainly turns heads. In and of itself it flanks Tom Ford - Tobacco Vanille quite easily. Two sprays will suffice for most. Overall, that alone raises this fragrances' worthiness more than anticipated. 18.21 is a new fragrance that many will find to be one of the best to wear. Again, it will turn heads and draw subtle attention to, absolutely!!
Scent - 9/10, Sillage - 8/10, Longevity - 9/10

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2021

I HIGHLY recommend.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 24, 2016
review_body:
Many years ago I can remember my late grandmother and my Mum using this, but I could never remember what it was called, but could always remember the still and design of the label.

So when I was looking for a fragrance for a gift the other day, guess what I found out the fragrance I loved as a child was called ‚Äú4711 Original Eau de Cologne Splash‚Äù, so I was really please and decided to treat myself.

It arrived well packed from Amazon, so the bottle was still in one piece. :-)

They still use the same lovely branded boxes that I remember from childhood.

The cologne is in a glass bottle with the branded label on the front. The firm still uses a metal top which is in gold and red and has a red branded label round the lid, (the top was very tight so it took a little time to open it) and the 4711 is on top of the lid.

4711 is a traditional German Eau de Cologne by Maurer & Wirtz which has been around for 222 years, the firm has a large range that also includes deodorant, aftershave and soap. :-)

It uses essential oils and has an aromatheraputic effect.

The top notes are orange oil, peach, basil, bergamot and lemon. Its middle notes are cyclamen, lily, melon, jasmine and bulgarian rose. The base notes are patchouli, tahitian vetiver, musk, sandalwood, oakmoss and cedar.

It‚Äôs a classic and can be used by both women and men.

I can remember as a child when I didn‚Äôt feel well or had trouble sleeping it was always something my late grandmother and Mum used to place on my temples to help relax me.

I still find this relaxing and calming today, (so besides using lavender I can also use this as well).

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 25, 2017
review_body:
I really love the smell of this scent - I'm a fan of citrus scents, and the citrus of this, combined with the bergamot and peach make it truly refreshing. It's also a classic scent, so it might also speak to the memory side of your brain!

This bottle gives a good amount. However, the neck of the bottle is so small that you can pretty much tip it upside down and nothing comes out. Applying it to the skin this way does not therefore give enough scent to last - I feel it stays for a few short hours. I find that decantering into an atomizer makes a difference, as you can spray more onto you over a larger area. The difficulty is that you can't simply pour the liquid from the bottle into the atomizer because the neck is so slim, so I've been siphoning it into the atomizer with an extremely slim straw (which is, unfortunately, shorter than the bottle, so I'm going to have to find another solution once I use up enough to make the remaining liquid unattainable..).

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 28, 2020
review_body:
TLDR:

+ Amazing and refreshing scent, perfect for summers.
+ Great as an aftershave or for bed linen.
- Poor performance, but to be fair that's not what this is intended for.

I absolutely love this scent, reminds me of a barber shop for some reason. This is a light and sparkly neroli that's perfect for warmer weather, unfortunately this cologne concentration does not last long on my skin‚ÄîI get 30 minutes to an hour maximum, so I use this almost exclusively as an aftershave. Amazing scent though!

For those complaining, is not an EDT or EDP, it's a cologne splasher so don't expect long lasting performance from it‚Äîthat's not the point. If you want a similar neroli fragrance that lasts a bit longer, check out Tom Ford's Neroli Portofino.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 24, 2013
review_body: I bought a bottle of 4711 after discovering that it was very popular in the 1950s, which is my favourite decade. I highly recommend this product because I think the scent is a delightful, timeless classic. I would, however, try the scent before buying this product because it smells slightly different to what I imagined. I think it smells very citrusy and it has a sort of musty tang to it when it is first applied; the ,longer you leave it on, the nicer the scent becomes. It is strong when you first apply it but then becomes more subtle by the end of the day. This bottle of 4711 is extremely good value-I haven't seen it cheaper anywhere else; it also lasts a long time because I have been using it for months now and I still have lots left! the packaging is wonderful, it has a traditional and grand air to it and looks lovely on my shelf. I highly recommend this product.

review_body: My grandmother back in her day was eloquently put together - very much to detail with her choice of clothing. One of the things she always had on her dressing table was a bottle of 4711. Although I do not use frilled cloth handkerchiefs, I love the crisp and fresh scent of this cologne. I splash this on my face and body after a shower. It gives me an active buzz and I really do feel refreshed. I love it and when using Google it brings back the memories of my grandmother.

review_body: I have all of the Aqua Colonia Fragrances and find them to be a wonderful change from the heavy blended colognes that all seem to smell overpowering. These are all great on their own, however they are light and easy to layer if you would like to try it. This one should be sprayed first, and it is a lovely fragrance on it's own or with the Mandarin orange or the peach, or lime spritzed on top. They are really fun to have and all smell terrific. This Lychee Mint one does seem to last longer. That's why spraying it first works out better. I have allergies and these all work for me. Also, some of the complaints that say they don't last long has to do with our own sensitivities to fragrance. After a while most of us will naturally adjust to certain fragrances we are wearing and no longer notice it and think its too light, or we need more. However others can really still smell them on us.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2023
review_body: I had never tried this scent before, but I read about it. I found the history aspect of it interesting. It was cheap enough, so I ordered it. Once I smelled it, I tossed it in the trash. I would say the scent is familiar, but not sure from where. The scent is not terrible, but I don't find it pleasant. I smelled my wrist a little while later to see if it would grow on me, and the smell wasn't even there. So not only doesn't it smell great, it doesn't last an hour. I would not recommend buying this unless you have smelled it in person. I was going to see if one of my family members wanted it, but I was actually so confident that nobody would like it that I tossed it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2020
reviewer_title: One of the Oldest Scents to come out of Germany
review_body: Okay, this stuff is one of the oldest perfumes created in Cologne, Germany. Created, I believe, in 1872 and the scent seems that it would be pretty accurate for that time period. It is not, however, a modern scent. Its overpowering and if you're a frequent blind purchaser of perfumes or colognes and are familiar with the scent Natalie, designed by the family of actress Natalie Wood that was murdered in the prime of her amazing acting career. This is not a cologne to wear if you're sensitive to smells. If you just want to have it because of the age of the cologne (not original bottle or packaging) and just to say you have one of the oldest colognes to come out, then this will work for you.

reviewer_title: Nice, historic cologne though it doesn't last long
review_body:
Great scent - citrus and forest-like. As others have said, it doesn't last long. But its been around for centuries. Potent scent for the first 30 minutes, then weak scent up to 2 hours or so, then its pretty much gone. I think of it more as an after-shave than an actual cologne. Especially at the price-per-ounce (+/- 10 oz bottles for cheap?).
Not taking off any stars. Its an awesome product for those who understand its history and its limitations. Look forward to reorder when its time.

Beautiful Jasmine scent that while probably needs refreshing during the day actually lasts longer than 10 mins as described. I got 4hrs min out of it in a job where I wash my hands every 30 mins at present.
I've been complimented on it so much since too.
Good price point too. Def will buy it again.

To me its very feminine.

Nb: A week after using it, I have found that if you spray clothing with it, it tends to last. My nightgown still had the scent the following day. So a good 12hrs later, same with my hoody.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 6, 2020
review_body:
This is very simply a beautifully intoxicating and heady jasmine cologne. It takes your mind off straight away to the Mediterranean. No sooner had I shaved and splashed this on than I was a young boy again visiting my grandmother in Cyprus : she used to sit in the evenings by her front door under an arch of jasmine - the smell was absolutely heavenly as every now and again a little jasmine flower would fall off. This cologne is a bottle full of those little flowers. Imagine the sound of cicadas, an old, Byzantine church on the hill side silhouetted by the setting sun, a little taverna just about to get the evening rolling as a couple of cats lie blissfully asleep still on a couple of straw chairs and, like a mysterious ancient Greek god travelling between the shadows and flicker of the eyelid - you smell this jasmine pervading and riding upon every single air current that the evening avails to intoxicate and enchant your
soul. I will be buying this again.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 7, 2021
review_body: My mum's a 4711 nut - since a trip to Cologne many years ago. Don't blame her. It's a lovely spritzy scent and a fraction of the cost of much more stylised offerings using much the same base. What's lovely about this latest scent, one of several, is it has the distinctive scent but with the added charm of jasmine. It's not overly obvious and is all the better for the subtlety. You can't miss or mistake it. Almost kept this bottle back for myself but relented - and the good news is my brother is buying the other new 4711 scents for Ma for her 85th birthday.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2022
review_body: I have used 4711 for over 60 years. When my TOD in Germany ended I bought the biggest bottle I could find and brought it back with me. At times it had been difficult to find and I used Guerlain L'Imperial when I couldn't find 4711. I don't think that the scent lasts as long as it did years ago (or maybe I just smell like an old man), but the scent has never changed. People do need to understand that Eau du Cologne is not the same as Eau du Toilette, which is twice as expensive and lasts a bit longer, but EDT is much too expensive to use as a splash. 4711 takes that title hands down!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2015
review_body: I've loved this product since I was a child (60+ years ago), when my mother would get the tiny, tiny bottles and let me use it occasionally. Life then came along and I'd forgotten all about the cologne until recently a co-worker returned to her native Germany for a visit and brought back some of the tiny, tiny bottles and handed them out to her co-workers. I had been hoarding my bottle, just bringing it out to enjoy it every once in a while, when it occurred to me that I could probably BUY some of it (we couldn't afford it when I was a child). Sure enough, after doing a web search, there was my favorite retailer, Amazon, offering it for sale. I purchased a bottle and have been reveling in it ever since. Even my husband likes the smell and he usually hates perfumes and colognes and is actually allergic to most of them. Thanks, Muelhens, for continuing to produce this marvelous fragrance all of these years, and for bringing back pleasant memories of my childhood and of my dear mother, whom I miss greatly.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2021
review_body: This stuff smells amazing! Although, it does not last long, as everybody knows. I put some in a spray bottle, like the ones you get from Walmart, to take with me to freshen up whenever I want. It has a nice cooling effect, and the smell is beautiful and non-offensive. I also use as an aftershave, and Hand sanitizer when needed! Its also great to put on a cloth or paper towel and wipe your face off with.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2022
review_body: Longevity is modest and preferred. Smells clean and is subtle after the invigorating splash. Hard to find new scents with these sensible qualities.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2020
reviewer_title: The best after shave I have ever used.
review_body: This is a wonderful after shave. It has the fragrances of a Old Spices but much more subtle and pleasant. I first found this product at the Macy's Store in downtown San Francisco. It was sold under the name "Dante" in the 1960s but may have been packaged under that name just for Macy's Department Stores. When it disappeared from Macy's I found it again 20 years later in a German Food and Deli in Portland OR. Same container, same coloration and design on the labeling but under its real product name "4711". Same great product as ever. You cannot go wrong with this it has endured many generations having the same high quality.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2020
review_body: I haven‚Äôt worn any scent in a while, but given this stinky year, I decided I needed to smell something nice in order to brighten the mood, so I treated myself to this cologne. I‚Äôm glad I did - I remember it from years ago, and at the time thinking it smelled like licorice (?) ... anyways, I decided to try it again after reading the notes it contained, and I think it‚Äôs wonderful. It smells more like orange blossoms to me now with a slight vetiver background to it. Unisex and light. Love it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2015
review_body: I don't recommend buying this eau de cologne as it is NOT the original item. My mother, now deceased, wore 4711 all her life so I knew exactly what to expect. And because it's the fragrance I always associated with her, I bought a bottle to evoke her memory. I was very disappointed to discover that the product I received from Amazon is not the same fragrance. Not even close. The label on the bottle and the box it was packaged in seem authentic (or at least a good imitation) but the actual perfume inside is likely a knock-off. Which may explain why the seal was loose. Somewhere along the line, someone slipped in a substitute. It doesn't smell bad, but trust me: This is not the real thing. According to the official 4711 history, the formula for this perfume has not changed in more than 200 years.

review_body: This is my first time using this brand, but I did buy the aftershave to go with it, and the scent is the same but much weaker compared to the aftershave. I was hoping for something that could really take care of sweat but the tissues don't seem to be made for that. So to carry these around for the summer, is still good, but you'll still want a towel or paper towel if you're in extreme heat. The downside for me though is really how the scent is not that strong and the tissues are a pinch too dry. The scent is a bit musky and citrusy, like cloves in a way. At $7 for 10 of these, I'm not really impressed, but I still like them. These will fit inside of a wallet.

My girlfriend was explaining rhia perfume to me, saying her mom wore it a lot back in the day. Never heard of it. But found it on Amazon, of course. I have never NOT found something on here so far.
I bought the towelettes becuz I didn't understand the description. Sounded more like a man's cologne. I think I read it is for both sexes. But still was not sure if this was the scent she was reminiscing about so.........
It was "the" one! I was so relieved!!

review_body: I give no stars. I got duped. This was a blatant rip off of an iconic scent. It smells like the knock offs from a flea market. This one came out on the first pump. Then the iconic picture of the Abercrombie torso was actually a sticker on the back! I should‚Äôve read the reviews. reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviewer_title: Wanted to love this so much - however not what I anticipated...
review_body:
I received the product and it smelled nothing like what was advertised. I personally had this scent prior, compared it to my old bottle and it was completely different. I also went to the store to compare the scents since the seller informed me the formula had changed. Again - the scent at the store was what I'm familiar with, however the item that I ordered here was completely different.

I tried the cologne for a day or two, hoping it would work with my body and somehow become the scent that I knew and loved. Unfortunately that did not happen and the scent that was there - wore off quickly. I wanted to love this product so much, however it does not seem to be what I anticipated. Happy to disclose more, however my last review was denied - so In an effort to ensure this review is posted, I have cut back on details that I personally felt were important for future/potential customers.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2023
review_body:
To me, fragrances are an added layer of self expression. You wouldn't know it by looking at me, but I do like weirder and more unique things. Not all the time, but sometimes. This fragrances absolutely fits that bill.

What intrigued me was the "melon opening." Boy was I not let down. It is yummy. I practically want to start biting my wrists thinking it's made of melon. If you're wondering what kind of melon it smells like, I'd definitely say it leans more towards cantaloupe. Ripe cantaloupe. Specifically the super soft, uber flavorful cantaloupe that practically melts in your mouth. Now add just a tiny dash of peppery spiciness. Boom there you go.

Now, my biggest grip with this fragrance is that it's amazing opener....is....the opener. I really wish that stuck for a long time. But it doesn't. That opener lasts for a couple/few hours and then it's gone. It also doesn't really project that much when it is "strong." So what does the scent evolve into after the melon? Honestly, no clue. It's so subtle I really can't tell. After the first couple/few hours pass, I can't really smell much of anything. Mostly like a hint of melon and spice. But that's really it. Honestly it is a little disappointing.

So what happens if you over spray? Good question. It didn't improve the overall length of the fragrance's life. However, projection definitely got a lot better. Originally I'd say it'd be a 6in-1ft if that. After over spraying it was easily 1ft-1.5ft. And the scent bubble was definitely stronger. But again, the overall life was the same. And even sadder still, I couldn't really get anything else out of the scent. Once it's gone I got the same hint of melon along with a general sweetness. Which was pleasant. But it's also a skin scent.

Is it worth the buy? Maybe. Price is okay in my book. Longevity just sucks. I think that's the biggest crutch. The smell itself is also really unique. If that's important to you, I'd say get it. If you're wondering where the hell you would wear this fragrance, I'd say anywhere really. It'd be a decent office scent if your office is more laid back. It'd be great for the spring or a cool summer's night. A day at the lake. Probably could get away with it at the beach too. If you don't like overpowering your date or if you think you two are going to be snuggling up later, this definitely won't blast them in the face to the point they have a headache. They will be aware that it's there, and they will enjoy it. You might not get a compliment, but they'll subconsciously know it's there and will enjoy it at the very least.

TL;DR: If you wanna smell unique, go for it. If you don't want to overpower your date but still want to wear something fresh and sweet, go for it.

Oh, and I gotta say this is easily my favorite bottle in my small growing collection of fragrances. It's really really nice.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2020
reviewer_title: One is not like the other, Fake
review_body:
One is real and one is fake, if you looked at the pictures and can‚Äôt tell I don‚Äôt blame you but there are a few things that scream knock off. I bought the real from Abercrombie directly, loved the scent and figured if this is real and that much cheaper then I‚Äôm in business. Sadly it‚Äôs not, you get what you pay for. Mine was purchased and shipped from Giftmart, can‚Äôt speech for the other vendors product but based off other reviews of poor longevity I don‚Äôt think it matters and they are all the same.

1) A&F First instinct is sold exclusively online and not at there stores. Why is this a point you ask, why does the 3.4oz have a bar code when is sold exclusively online. The 1.7oz I bought last week from Abercrombieandfitch.com doesn‚Äôt have one and makes sense why it doesn‚Äôt, they don‚Äôt need one for online distribution.

2) I sprayed the 3.4oz Amazon on my left hand and 1.7oz A&F First Instinct on my right. The smell was off at first then kinda matched the authentic after a couple minutes but after like 1-1.5 hours you couldn‚Äôt smell the Amazon clone at all. The Authentic last on my skin for 8-10 hours.

3) The ingredients are out of order, ingredients are labeled from most to least percentage. How would the same cologne have different percentages of ingredients for the same smell. Also the origin is different for the clone

4) Clone states 70% alcohol, authentic doesn‚Äôt. Leads me to believe this is watered down First instinct to make 3.4oz bottles. Which would contribute to horrible, seriously HORRIBLE performance. You need to carry it and reapply 7 times in an 8hr work day just to keep the smell.

So in conclusion; Smell 4 stars; Longevity 1 Star; Price 1 star. You save half buying here then from Abercrombie directly but you are getting a clone with 1/8th the performance so in turn you have to keep using more to get the longevity and end up spending more money buying more when the 1 time purchase of the authentic would still have much more to go! So not a bargain in my eyes. Was hoping for a hidden gem online for a great price and sadly that‚Äôs just not the case. I would not recommend this, you‚Äôre getting $10 Worth of the cologne then the other $30 you are paying for perfumers alcohol and water.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2017
review_body:
First off I'd like to point out that I had the same concern as many others here about the authenticity of the product. And I can confirm that it is legit, at least the one I was sent anyway!! Packaging matched the real deal and everything.
The smell of this cologne is a great summer scent and should be great for multiple occasions. My only complaint and the reason for the four stars instead of 5 is that I wish the scent would be a little stronger for more time. It doesn't fade away after an hour like some other scents. I only put two sprays, one on my right wrist and one on my neck and it'll last for a few hours before getting to the point where you have to get close to smell it. I sort of prefer it that way as I don't want to smell up the whole room! But it could be a tad stronger in my opinion! All in all, a great buy and I would definitely recommend!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2019
review_body: This colognes smells absolutely amazing! I received SEVERAL compliments while wearing it! It‚Äôs also cheap enough for anybody to afford it too! Speaking of cheap... the reason why it‚Äôs so cheap is because the longevity absolutely sucks! The cologne opens with a fruity smell that drives the ladies crazy! Then it dries down to a fresh, borderline soapy scent that ladies still enjoy and compliment. The problem is, this cologne only lasts about 5 minutes! Maybe even 4 minutes and 36 seconds! You‚Äôll definitely have to carry an atomizer filled with this cologne in order to reapply it over and over throughout the day. Or you can buy Abercrombie & Fitch First Instinct Extreme instead. The extreme version supposedly smells exactly the same, but with better longevity! Great scent, atrocious longevity!

reviewer_title: Not horrible, but not the same..
review_body: Definitely not the scent we remember walking into an AF store. I personally did not shop there, as I am a normally sized man. Not scrawny! But, I would have to service these locations and I always liked the scents that they drown ALL of the clothing on their sales floor. The powers that be assessed that this would be a fantastic idea by customers associating the scents with "The Look" AF was known for. And it worked! The scent is fresh, vibrant and stood apart from other scents of that time. I own around fifty scents now and figured I'd add this to my growing collection. This is NOT the scent. It's not horrible, but not the same.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2021
reviewer_title: If you love the smell of GASOLINE, this is the scent for you!
review_body: For my first time purchasing cologne online, this was an EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTING first experience. I usually by Fierce by A&C, but I heard that "First Instinct" was a great choice as well, and boy was I WRONG! I just received the scent today, and just after 2 sprays of this horrendous cologne, it made the entire room and myself reek of GASOLINE....YES, GASOLINE!!!! I don't know if this certain supply fell on the ground of the parking lot and they tried to save it by sponging it up with shop towel rags soaked in gas, but it is THE WORST SMELL of a cologne that I have EVER tried, ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE!! My wife came in the room after I sprayed it and asked if I stepped in GASOLINE, because THE COLOGNE SMELLS JUST LIKE GASOLINE!! Unfortunately I can't return it since Amazon doesn't let you return liquids, so now I'm stuck with a $35 bottle of Gasoline!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2014
review_body:
This is an update to the previous review because I've purchased this perfume a couple times since. Two different sizes. One was 1.75 fl. Oz. The other, a more recent order was 3.4. My review is for the perfume not the male cologne. This is my all time favorite. I've ordered this perfume from Amazon several times over 6 or 7 years. Unfortunately this particular fragrance isn't in production anymore so the harder to find the more expensive it gets. The smaller bottle was great, no problems whatsoever. However the more recent order (3.4 oz) came packaged fine, didn't look like it was tampered with in any kind of way and it smells wonderful. The only problem is the scent doesn't last but maybe 30 minutes, so I guess I finally got one of the knock offs that a lot of other reviewers have talked about.üò¢ But when I run out of it I'll probably order another one.üòï

This is my absolute favorite perfume. It's not sold in stores anymore so I was overjoyed when I came across it on Amazon. I am completely satisfied with my order. It came in a timely manner and it smells wonderful. I've read other reviews that complained of a fake, however mine was the real deal.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviewer_title: Makes me smell good. Does NOT render invisibility.
review_body:
The pros:

* Makes me smell good.
* Inexpensive, good for daily casual use.
* Decent quantity for the price.
* Nice container.

The cons:

* Does not make me invisible. Even if applied twice a day.
* Has no bat-repelling qualities.
* Fails to attract supermodels from a distance greater than 5 kilometers. Also distances less that 5 kilometers.
* A very poor substitute for diesel fuel.

On the whole, I am very pleased with this product, although I would encourage Armani to work on the invisibility issue.
