reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2008
review_body:
Rarely does a product entice me enough in order to write a review for it. I have been using Acqua di Gio for the past 4-5 years, if not longer. As it stands right now, I will not wear another fragrance unless Mr. Armani should stop selling it. However, it seems that AdG is one of the top-selling fragrances, so that should not be a problem for quite a while.

I cannot and will not comment with the "woodsy" "dainty" "curry" or whatever descriptive words other reviewers have used to quantify this particular smell. Until the Internet implements "Smell-o-Vision" I don't think it's anybody's business to even attempt to quantify it with those words - you won't smell like the woods (thankfully), nor dainty, nor like curry (thankfully x 2). My advice is to go to the store and try it for yourself.

A lot of the users say "go buy this for your husband" or something along those lines. This is not the case - this fragrance is not for all people, nor is any other fragrance universally pleasant-smelling. People have their own distinct odors, and the fragrance that they use will complement their odor either in a positive or negative fashion. I personally smell horribly when I use muskier cologne such as Davidoff. I smell "eh" or just "ok" if I use Polo Sport - it doesn't really complement my natural smell very nicely... However, with AdG it's another story. This is the one and only fragrance that I've worn and received complements and/or inquiries as to the brand of fragrance. For me it works magically. I certainly hope it works just as nicely for you, but you'll have to experiment to find out.

So that is why I'm keeping it around, and why I'm writing this review. This fragrance is perfect for me. I've tried dozens of other fragrances throughout the years, yet nothing has smelled as good on me. By the way, when you try it out, don't spray it on the little paper tabs they have at stores. Spray it on your wrist (a light, gentle spray) and then rub it in. However, do not smell it just quite yet - let it air out for 10 minutes (go to the socks section or something like that so you get out of the strong-smelling section of the store [fragrance section]). Then take a whiff. Spraying the fragrance on a paper tab will only partially indicate how the fragrance truly smells when sprayed on yourself...

review_body:
This stuff is the real deal, any reviews regarding counterfeit versions are old and before Amazon stepped in and switched their supplier, because what I received in the mail was a scent that gets me complements from everyone, men and women.

Acqua Di Gio gets respect from men and the most appropriate term would be appreciation from women. May this help on a date or in a club? Probably, but it's simply a very pleasant scent almost anyone will enjoy when around it.

It's also very famous and most people I know recognized it by name when they noticed it on me.

If you're looking to be the freshest person in the room, Acqui Di Gio is for you, if you want something unique to keep people guessing, I'd keep searching.

As a side note, some reviews mention that the scent goes away after a while and this indicates a fraudulent product, but anything you spray on yourself, your nose adapts to and I've actually asked when I stopped smelling it if my coworker could, and she could. Only I couldn't smell it, but it was there. Also, if sprayed on clothing, don't expect it to last long, cologne is for the skin, spraying on the warmer parts of your body like the inner elbows, backs of knees, wrists, neck, and chest help your body heat amplify the scent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2013
review_body:
The best cologne I've ever had. Georgio Armani makes an epoch product here. My wife and I both love the scent and it's long lasting. My only complaint would be the price, but at $90.80 (free shipping), Amazon beats the department stores. I highly recommend it.

I read some of the other reviews on Amazon about people getting fake bottles of perfume and cologne they bought on Amazon. That concerned me, prompting me to do some research. I found out that authentic bottles of cologne and perfume have a serial number engraved in the bottom of the box and a matching serial number on the bottom of the bottle. So look for that. Also, some of the reviewers said the smell wears off in 10 minutes on their "fake" bottles. Well, even on legitimate bottles, the smell is going to wear off in 10 minutes because your body's olfactory nerves, the nerves responsible for smell, will send repeated amounts of sensory information to the brain, which then ignores that piece of sensory information due to the repetition of the smell. Instead, if you can't smell the cologne anymore, ask a friend or if you're feeling bold, ask a stranger to smell you and they will be able to smell it. As always, if the price is too good to be true, it probably is. Good luck.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2014
reviewer_title: I got the REAL stuff as of March 2014
review_body:
Well I have been very hesitant after reading the fake cologne reviews on this cologne, after all spending almost $100 on cologne ain't no joke, so I went ahead and googled fake Acqua Di Gio and the video with most views explained very well what some differences are.

All of the obvious signs such as "Silver" (more reflective) letters on the front of the bottle checked out, the CLEAR tube instead of the FAKE white tube inside the bottle checked out.

The smaller sprayer diameter instead of the fake bottles larger diameter checked out, but make sure you don't freak out if you don't have a fake one to compare it to.

And overall the BIGGEST test. I sprayed a total of 2 yes TWO squirts around my neck this morning, right under my turtleneck underarmor shirt, and after a 12 hour shift working in a warehouse i came home and every time i turn my head I can smell the fragrance VERY strongly.

I'm sure most people write these reviews when things go wrong but as of March 2014 i gotta say that my cologne is absolutely legit.

Best of luck to you guys amazon shoppers. Save some money and buy with confidence, amazon is back on track with their quality control.

Love the smell, 5 out of 5!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2020
review_body: Upon reading several reviews I was extremely hesitant on ordering this cologne from Amazon seeing that many customers complained of receiving fake products. I ended up biting the bullet ordered the 6.7oz. To prove its authenticity I did a bottle comparison since I have a legit, empty Aqua Di Gio bottle that I had bought from Macy's. I Googled, "How to spot a fake Aqua Di Gio cologne". Many results appeared with picture comparisons that helped aid in the confirmation. It turned out the product I received was legit when I compared them. I would strongly advise anyone who plans on purchasing this to have some sort of comparison e.g. empty bottle of this cologne or picture from Google; so that you do not get ripped off.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2017
review_body:
Acqua Di Gio is my favorite cologne. I started wearing it back in college about 16 years ago, and I know the scent well. I was excited when my wife got me this bottle as a gift; however I quickly became suspicious of this bottles legitimacy. The scent was a close, but smelled a little off, and it quickly wore off. I went out to a local reputable Acqua Di Gio authorized seller and picked up the same bottle I am reviewing now. After comparing the two bottles and boxes, I have come to realize that I have received a fake. A very good fake, but a fake none the less. Here are the biggest red flags that lead me to this conclusion.

1. I sprayed the bottle I am reviewing now and the bottle I bought at my local retail store on a few test strips. I set the test strips aside for 4 hours, and came back to smell them. The strips from the bottle I am reviewing barely had any scent on them. The strips from the retail store still had a strong Acqua Di Gio scent to them.

2. The box of the Acqua Di Gio I am reviewing is a slightly different shade of white from the box I purchased at the retail store. You can't tell from the picture but it is visible in person.

3. The box purchased at the retail store has a barcode printed directly on the box. The barcode on the box I am reviewing has clearly been tampered with. There is a square cut out of the box where the barcode would be, and a barcode sticker was placed over it. I have included pictures of this. Also, the retail box has dots printed to the left and right of the barcode. The box I am reviewing does not have these dots. These dots are offset far enough away that they should still be visible in the area that was not cut out.

I contacted Amazon and their customer service was outstanding as always. They immediately issued us a refund, and assured us they would check their stock.

The feedback on this fragrance is positive and it is generally liked. Recently I also purchased a small bottle of Acqua Di Gio Profumo which lasts even longer and provides you with a slightly more upscale scent. This scent reminds me of summer and the Mediterranean. A winner.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2013
review_body:
I bought this one from Amazon, not from my usual place (sephora) not for the price difference, but to try how amazon fares in perfumes. But, alas!, what a bad experience did I have!

I received this one within a week or so. When I sprayed first time onto my wrist, I felt something odd. It smelled very differently from that of the the ADG I was used to. After half an hour or so, the top notes vanished and my wrist was left with somewhat acrid odour -- like propanol or methanol.

Next day I called up amazon, the customer service exec. apologized and offered a free replacement. I stupidly agreed to it. The replacement took one more week to reach me. But frankly, it smelled the same.

So, I want you - the reader - to be aware that what I received is a counterfeit perfume. Such fakes looks common. The second time, I called up Amazon and they offered a full refund (which is good). But I wasted an inordinate amount of time and effort (and expectation) in this whole buying exercise. I should have stuck with sephora.com

When I wanted to file a complaint with amazon's customer service, they simply refused to file a complaint against counterfeit perfume. The guy clarified that Amazon.com does not have a process to accept complaints regarding the genuineness of the products they sell. This was in sharp contrast to what the first CSE explained.

Anyway, Amazon may or may not be aware of this (presence of counterfeits in their inventory). I am never buying a perfume from Amazon again. You are warned!

(Edit : Even though I mentioned I would never buy perfumes from Amazon, I bought two

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2017
reviewer_title: * Counterfeit... Although maybe not as bad as some have expressed... None the less I beleive it to be Counterfeit *
review_body:
Let me start by saying that I have purchased Acqua Di Gio from retail stores, 1-2 times a year, for over 10 years. I am however new to the Amazon thing, so I researched this item through multiple sellers and I had read many different reviews ranging from "Good to Bad", "Counterfeit to Not", "Happy to Not Happy", Etc., Etc.
I thought to myself, it is being sold by Amazon & shipped by Amazon so how could it possibly be anything but the "Real Deal", well I found what many others have commented on...

After purchasing a 6.7oz bottle, I found that the SKU # on the box had been cut with a small razor blade and a new sticker w/ SKU bar code only was installed over the cut-out in the box, the scent seemed a bit off [not exactly what I am accustomed to], the scent only lasted for a few hours [where as it typically lasts most of the day 10-12 hours easily], the cap on the top of bottle was different [inner part & fitment], and the sticker on the bottom of the bottle didn't match the same set-up or design as the ones on my other bottles that were purchased from retail stores [damn close but not the same].

Bottom line for me is "If it is too good to be true, it probably is" comes to mind here... IMO, the smell is ok at best, most people may not be able to tell the difference, but if you regularly purchase from a retail store and wear it often, chances are that you are going to notice the difference as do I.

Link to purchased product:

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2016
reviewer_title: Product had cut out portion of box underneath taped on barcode?
review_body: Just received this today. It smells the same from what I can tell. The cellophane appeared a little old and possibly opened in the past. My main concern is the barcode on the side of the box once you open the cellophane wrapper. I pulled the sticker on barcode off the package and it was obvious that someone had cut the original barcode or batch # from the box? Not sure why that would be done. I am adding a picture. This was shipped from Amazon and not a 3rd party. I hope it is not counterfeit. Also the 2nd picture is from a website on how to identify fake. My original has a lighter color gray writing on the front, and the on I received from Amazon is darker gray. My main concern is the cut out on the box? Amazon should supply an answer as to why the box would be cut like this and a new barcode placed over what I think was a batch #?. After also looking at how to identify fake product most of the items match, although the lettering is a little darker Gray than the correct product. Again, I am not 100% sure because it smells the same if it will last? I think I will by from a local mall next time and pay the $20.00 more. I am not sure if this is real or fake at this time.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2022
review_body: Good, long lasting!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2013
reviewer_title: Got a fake as well, buy from a reputable store instead!
review_body:
I bought the 6.7 ounce bottle a while back from Amazon and something felt off on it. It didn't quite smell the same as my original bottle from a department store at a local mall where I originally tried the fragrance, loved it, and bought a large bottle. That one even came with the extra little kit of items like aftershave and shower gel for not much more cash than Amazon. I decided to ignore my suspicions, though, not wanting to believe it was a fake, and maybe it was my memory that was bad.

I found myself using a lot more however since the smell wasn't as distinct as I remembered and I usually put more on at night since it only lasted a couple hours, so it ran out very quickly. After reading some reviews on here before reordering, I learned that many people were saying that they got fake ones, even those ordered straight from Amazon (like mine)! They suggested doing a test with a reputable store bought one. OK, that's a great idea. So I did.

I got the same size on sale from a reputable department store online, free shipping for LESS than the Amazon price. It came yesterday. I did the test suggested by others, putting the Amazon version on on side of my body, on one arm, and the new one on the other. I did not tell my wife this. 10 hours later, I come home as ask my wife to smell both arms. What do you smell here? Nothing! Here? Nice cologne! The claims in the one star reviews were true.

There you go. Don't buy perfume from Amazon, even Amazon direct. It seems they are reselling fakes at the premium price. Shop around online at the large department stores and get a discount code. Amazon is great when it comes to most items, but with perfumes I can just no longer trust them. They really need to investigate this.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2017
reviewer_title: The fragrance is very similar to what I remembered Acqua Di Gio smelling like, though it had been several years since I ...
review_body:
I have a suspicion that the product that I received was not authentic. Visually, the product seems to have all of the hallmarks of an authentic product: tight cellophane wrapper, quality cardboard box, holographic sticker, embossed batch code on the box which matches the bottle. The atomizer did have a very slight breach on its seal, but otherwise the cap and the bottle looked authentic.

The fragrance is very similar to what I remembered Acqua Di Gio smelling like, though it had been several years since I had last worn it. Perhaps a slight bit spicier and more citrusy. However, what clued me in to it not being authentic is that it gave me a severe headache almost immediately after spraying it on. I went to Macy's to sample a known authentic bottle, and that fragrance did not give me a headache.

The fact that the product (as of Sept 2017) was sold and shipped by Amazon convinced me that the bottle was more likely to be authentic despite the conflicting reviews. It seems as though that is not enough of an endorsement. Amazon has since refunded my purchase and escalated my return to their special review team. I had also seen a similarly priced 6.7 oz bottle on Target.com, so it didn't appear that the price was too good to be true.

reviewer_title: Smells good but weak and no staying power.
review_body: This is a large bottle of ACQUA DI GIO by Giorgio Armani. 6.7 FL oz. The price seems too good to be true. Well, I have used ACQUA DI GIO for quite a while and I can tell you that this purchase IS too good to be true. The scent does not last at all and it's weak. I thought I would give it a shot but seriously, a 3.4 oz bottle usually cost $120 to $135. The 3.4 oz bottles that I've purchased from the more upscale department stores lasts at least 4X longer on the body or clothing and requires far fewer sprays. It looks real but it's not real. Another giveaway was that the cellophane wrapper was carefully opened on one end and not reseal. Don't waste your money on this product.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2019
reviewer_title: Clean, serene, sublime, pure, high quality scent!
review_body:
Trying to be a wise consumer, I read every single review for this product. I must admit that there was only one factor that had me on the ropes, that did not fully convince me. I didn't feel comfortable with people describing this scent as "unisex." It made me think that the cologne would smell flowery, even subtly feminine and I did not want that at all.

I love scents that smell clean and fresh. Cologne has a powerful way of influencing the mood of the wearer. When you spray after taking a good, cool shower, you feel fresh, revitalized, even just born into this amazing world. Your feeling good raises your frequency, you are in a good mood. People catch that and your cent and mood extend these gifts to them.

Anyway, because the "unisex" comments were few, and the history of this product seemed solid, I took the plunge. I am SO GLAD I DID! I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT! I can totally understand why many reviewers stated that they wear it everyday! It is not overpowering at all. It has a very smooth, clean, pure scent. Almost like something that Nature herself could have concocted. It isn't a scent that would ever give you a headache, or make anyone sitting next to you, uncomfortable.

I even loved how it is packaged! Very unique, different than all other colognes. I love this scent so much that I now want to purchase the soap, aftershave, and even the talcum powder! I am definitely going to keep purchasing this product throughout the remainder of my life. It now makes perfect sense why it has never totally gone off the marker. A definite, TIMELESS masterpiece!

One reviewer said that this was a safe blind purchase. I don't fully agree. I can't really imagine a teenager who is at the dance-club, strip-club phase appreciating this olfactory work of art. This is a scent for a well-refined individual who has gained much wisdom throughout the years. Who has come to know what is good and to appreciate it. Who absolutely LOVES beauty in ALL her breathtaking forms.

Anyway, this is my testimony and I am sticking to it! Enjoy, my friend!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 4, 2023
review_body: Product arrived well packaged. Good value for the price.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2019
review_body: I originally thought this was fake. I thought I was comparing it to a sample I got directly from Aqua di Parma, but that sample turned out to be of Colonia Pura (the teeny tiny bottle was so small I could not see the "Pura" on the itsy weeny label). So they were different and since I knew the sample was authentic, this had to be a fake, not so. It is absolutely authentic and so fresh and clean. I got hold of an authentic bottle and it is exactly the same all through the base notes. So no worries there. This is a very fresh clean scent that in the mid notes turns spicey-leather and more masculine from the opening pure and glorious citrus. It then settles in the base notes to musk sandalwood, maintaining that note of masculinity. I don't consider it unisex at all. Some people might get confused because its a little sweet, soapy, clean with some powder scent in the mid notes. But it is definitely masculine in nature. Light but certainly not feminine. I highly recommend it. It is my signature scent. It's tried and true for over a century. Gets their attention subtly, unlike the overpowering sporty/club scents gentlemen fall for these days. That just telegraphs four miles down the road that you are trying to hide your sweat. This Aqua di Parma instead tells them you're clean and fresh all day. It lasts about 6 hours on me. The base note lasts the longest and is the best. Don't go anywhere for the first 15 minutes because you will smell like a lemon grove. :)

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
review_body: This is the original Acqua di Parma unisex cologne from Milan, Italy, said to have been worn by Cary Grant and Audrey Hepburn. Some knock-offs have appeared in the online market, but this is the authentic product.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2015
review_body:
If you're reading the reviews, you're probably smart about your money. You are probably a little nervous about trying out a new cologne without having tried it on first, or are wondering if this is authentic. I imagine many people perform this type of due diligence when it comes to online shopping, so I'm here to help.

However you landed on this cologne, please consider getting a sample first. The reviews calling it "old fashioned" are on to something- this was the preferred cologne in Golden Era Hollywood, attracting both men and women. I only wear this in the Spring and Summer, as it has a heavy initial citrus note, which makes me think of the beach.
It also doesn't wear very heavy, and you many not smell it on you after a few hours. I've heard it said that the best cologne is the kind you can't smell on you for the entirety of the day. I tend to forget I'm wearing anything, and then my temperature rises and I smell it again- very classy.

For those of you wondering if it is real- it is. Amazon has massive vetting processes for vendors. You can read about it if you like; my friend is a vendor so I hear it right from him. Why is this cologne cheaper? I imagine it's likely older stock. That doesn't make this a bad purchase- I wouldn't have bought it if I had any doubts.
Why spend $130 for a new bottle when this one might be just a year older?

C

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2020
reviewer_title: One of the world‚Äôs perfect scents, but beware expired bottles.
review_body:
Acqua di Parma is tasteful, subtle, classic, and genderless. It reminds one of a villa garden on the Mediterranean, and dries down to the scent of skin freshly cleansed with Italian soap. I‚Äôve worn it for 20 years.
Persons who want a bold scent that fills an elevator and gets noticed by strangers should choose something else. Perhaps the designer aisle at a discount store will have something they‚Äôll like.
* However, this seller sent me a bottle that is 8 years old. I wondered how they could sell it for >50% off the usual price, and why they would do so. It is authentic, but I discovered this bottle (Batch 2498X) is from 2012! Acqua di Parma and its parent company LVMH certainly don‚Äôt endorse selling or using a bottle this old.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2019
review_body: So I've been wanting to try this cologne for quite awhile and finally decided to treat myself to a bottle after deciding to expand my fragrance collection. I figured this was a relatively safe "blind buy" since it has been around over 100 years and is considered a classic. I have to admit that I really love this fragrance. First, it has a wonderfully bright and soapy scent coupled with notes of lemon and lavender. Definitely could be worn by either a man or woman. Secondly, it is from Acqua Di Parma, one of the oldest niche fragrance houses so I was able to try a niche frag at a comparatively affordable price point. Finally, it truly is a classic scent that has been worn for generations and still going strong. Wear this and you will feel like you are walking along the beach on a crisp summer day!

review_body: I discovered this fragrance more than 25 years ago when it was written up in either the NYT, WSJ, or the FT. This cologne was originally used by men in the `20s and was designed for men to put on a handkerchief which then was inserted in the front pocket of either a sport coat or a suit. This custom went out of style and the fragrance went with it. Some time in the late `80s or early `90s, someone decided to resuscitate the cologne, bought the rights to the name, and maybe even ‚ÄúFragrantiere‚Äù where it was manaufactured. I thought I`d try it but it was much more expensive then than it is now probably due to an initial low ‚Äúrun‚Äù

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 22, 2014
review_body:
EXCELLENT light fragrance which last ALL DAY.

Remember, everyone's body chemistry is unique, so this fragrance will smell differently on me than it does on you. I first purchased this fragrance 10 years ago on a British Airways flight on a whim, and have worn it pretty much ever since. The spray on this bottle is VERY FINE. Keep in mind you only need about 2 sprays AT THE MOST to give you all day coverage. If you don't know if this fragrance is for you or not, just buy a sample here...

http://www.amazon.com/Colonia-Acqua-Parma-05-Cologne/dp/B00475GQ6Q/ref=sr_1_5?ie=UTF8&qid=1395478076&sr=8-5&keywords=acqua+di+parma

Try it, and if you don't like it, you're only out a few bucks.

Aqua Di Parma is also a unisex fragrance. So it smells good the fairer sex also.

I would most assuredly recommend this fragrance to anyone who wishes a classy scent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 3, 2012
review_body:
I had read about Acqua Di Parma online, and I started investigating it a bit.
There aren't too many places around that carry it, so when I found it online,I was
excited to order it and try it out.
From the descriptions of it, I wasn't too sure what to expect, 'notes of citrus' etc.
What I found when I actually tried the cologne was something very unexpected. It's a very
clean scent, almost soap-like and I couldn't stop myself from smelling it and trying to figure out the
different scent layers.
What I discovered was that the longer I spent with the cologne, the more I liked it
and frankly, now I use it as the gold standard when trying other scents. For years I've looked
for a signature scent, something that would just be me and I think I've found it.
Light, fresh and clean.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2017
review_body: Warning: Possible fake cologne! I have enjoyed this cologne for many years. The better stories like Nordstrom, Saks, and Neiman Marcus have carried this higher end cologne and know their source. The original cologne is made in Milan, Italy. After receiving my recent purchase which was somewhat cheaper than the store price, I was excited about this 3.4oz travel size bottle. However, after using this cologne and comparing the fragrance with a larger bottle from Nordstrom, I am convinced that this is a knock off. The packaging, label, bottle, are exactly like the original but the fragrance is not. Since it came from overseas in an unmarked box, I suspect this was produced in another country. Amazon should launch an investigation into this seller to determine where they operate and source their products. A number of other customers have lodged similar complaints or concerns.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2020
review_body:
Packaging: I like the clean packaging and the bottle is pretty and understated.
Color: Bourbon tone ( unexpected and makes me question authenticity. The photos I have seen show this is a lighter brown tone. The bottle I received is a very deep tone).

This was a blind buy and it was reported to be a spicy floral with vanilla undertones, that is not what I am smelling. At first spray, I get a clean scent with a musky undertone but it dries powdery. I think powdery scents read matronly to me and that is why many are saying they do not like this as young women. However, its cast is not far and I think it could be a good layering fragrance for me to add more femininity to some other scents I wear as a tend to gravitate towards colognes and unisex fragrances. Update: this fragrance I have to spray directly on my skin. It leaves a nice powdery musk that I find intoxicating. I love wearing it to bed or just lounging.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2020
review_body:
Wow, what to say!
If you love sandalwood then you will love this!!! It opens with a warm citrusy spice and mellows out to a woodsy vanilla sandalwood benzoin. Yet isn‚Äôt stuffy like other woody scents can be. And it‚Äôs also intermingled with saffron, marigolds, rose petals and jasmine that I can‚Äôt smell individually but mingled together give this an undercurrent of creamy florals as it drys down.
I would say this is a sophisticated scent, simple yet sophisticated. Simple in that it starts, ends and lingers as a warm creamy sandalwood where as some perfumes start off super sweet then become fruity and finally settle into a caramelly warm scent. This fragrance stays true to itself from start to finish. It lasts all day. I get whiffs of it through out my day and it makes me smile.
The bottle and packaging are of simple design. I actually really like the box. The bottle is clear and tall to show off the delicious amber colored liquid inside. It‚Äôs heavy in the hand. The lid stays on snuggly.
I like to layer fragrances. This layers well with any vanilla fragrance or body spray, also with lemon. I have a lemon meringue body spray that I layer under this and it smells absolutely DIVINE!!!
If you enjoy warm woodsy amber scents then go ahead and get it!!
Update!
I love it so much I bought 2 more as back up lol

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
review_body:
Concerned when I saw the Marigold and Jasmine Notes in the ingredients listed. However, I am a Levine believer now...the marigold note adds this bright top note that just, to me, adds complexity and sparkle and is surprising with the sandlewood...it is a really well-balanced perfume. This is definitely not your Pink Sugar...it smells pricey and for a woman who is more discerning.
Just wanted to add that it is original in packaging, and the price was really unbeatable.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2020
review_body:
Oh my gosh. What an AMAZING $13 fragrance buy. This smells SO much classier than the price tag, or celebrity "creator," implies.

Sandalwood-lover's dream right here.

Official notes are as follows:
Top notes are saffron, citruses, marigold and spices
Middle notes are Indian jasmine, Australian sandalwood and rose petals
Base notes are benzoin and vanilla.

I'm not a talented "nose" when it comes to fragrances. I can't detect really any of the notes mentioned other than sandalwood upon first spray. Nor did I realize I like sandalwood this much. When I sniff my arm, I can detect florals (rose and jasmine). I can't wait for the drydown! The opening is lovely and elegant. I could see how many people think this fragrance screams older woman, but I don't think so at all. I'm in my mid-30s and am LOVING this. If you like warm, cozy fragrances with a touch of elegance and mystique, you'll like this.

I haven't directly smelled benzoin before, but I've read this is a component that turns many people off. Its possible this will "turn" on me once it settles on the skin, but I'll update my review if that's the case.

I'd say this is a better fall/winter/cooler temp/evening fragrance. Will that stop me from wearing it in the late hot KY summer? Nope!

Too long, didn't read: Recommended if you like more sultry, woodsy/warm scents. Fabulous value for the price!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 22, 2023
review_body: Smells really good. Great for a casual day or nice dinner out.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on March 11, 2014
review_body:
I love this fragrance - to me it smells like a combination of delightfully-aged scotch and a lush aromatic spiced wood bowl filled with citrus-flavored marigolds. A friend gave me a sample & and after wearing the sample for a day, I ordered it. So glad I did. I generally prefer more herbal/green scents, but this does it for me: fresh, not cloying, rich and warm without being over-powering.

Until I received my bottle & decided to read more about it, I had no idea who Adam Levine was (Maroon 5) or that this was a celebrity fragrance. (I think I assumed Adam Levine was The Nose, or some designer I'd never heard of.) That speaks volumes, because with the exception of Sarah Jessica Parker's line and a few others, my reaction to the Celebrity Craze has been negative: they mostly seem overly-sweet and candy-assed. Ew.

I'm not someone who thinks fragrance has gender - I'm female, but I couldn't care less if a perfume is intended for females or males. I've read some reviews of this fragrance that complain that it's too "manly", and while I'm not altogether convinced that phrase has much meaning, this certainly doesn't smell like a men's club, or Old Spice, or leather, or whatever you may associate with a men's cologne. It's just a well-balanced rich hit of lush, earthy freshness. Unique. I hope it never gets pulled out of production (as have so many other smells I've loved) because I intend to keep this in my regular winter scent rotation.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2022
review_body: This perfume caught my eye because I like Adam Levine. When I smelled it, I was very pleased. It's a very pleasant smell that draws a lot of compliments. You will like it. The bottle is really cool, too. It's shaped like a microphone. AND a big bottle is only 13 bucks! Enjoy.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2014
review_body:
This is by far the best perfume I've ever smelled. I bought it because I love Adam Levine, thinking it would smell like any other perfume, but I wanted to support him. But then I got it in the mail and 100% honesty-- unbiased (sorry Britney Spears, I love you but yours smelled like alcoholic bubblegum) this is amazing. I've had it for... I think a little over a month now, and I use it every day. Every single person in my family has told me that I smell amazing and wanted to know what it is. I even let my sister borrow it. It doesn't smell like your average cheap floral perfume. It smells sophisticated and mature, but also young and free at the same time... Woodsy but sweet. I can't describe it. But I definitely recommend it to anybody who's on the fence. The bottle is so beautiful, too. Even the cardboard box it comes in is classy. The bottle is clear, the cap is styled like a vintage microphone and the perfume itself is a light pink with a warm tint. And it lasts quite a few hours for me. But it's easy to throw in the car for easy reapply.
Bottom line-- GET THIS. It's the best yet.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2020
reviewer_title: Great Scent Considering The Price Point...
review_body: This fragrance presents a great way to wear a vanilla scent all year long. When you want to smell seductive but clean this perfume delivers that perfectly! The saffron, spices, Indian Jasmine, marigold, sandalwood, rose, and vanilla pair in a very well balanced accord that doesn't yield too "musky" as one might think would happen with so many florals at play. Adam Levine For Her is a more warm than strong scent which I love! It's a really good scent for any occasion and one that I feel you'd find yourself wanting to wear every day. The first day that I wore it I reapplied it throughout the day and kept falling in love over and over again. Given that the longevity of this fragrance isn't stellar it's okay for you to reapply it without fear of smelling too strong / overpowering. I'm definitely going to snag another bottle!!!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2013
review_body:
This perfume smells amazing both before and after it has already been applied. It has a woodsy yet spicy scent that lasts for a very long time. Whether or not it smells the same throughout the day depends on your skin. Everyone's skin chemistry is different...

In fact, if applied on paper and the scent settles in...it smells a bit sweeter and less spicy. On MY skin, it doesn't smell as sweet afterwards which is exactly what I want from a fragrance. A lot of other celebrity fragrances have a sweet, floral, or fruity smell to it but this smells like pure quality. It can be worn both during the day and at night. I love how versatile this is and I am so happy I took the chance and bought it without testing it out first.

The perfume personally smells great all day on my and I really can't compare it to any other scents, it's definitely unique.

Not the good kind of leather or spice either. However, that‚Äôs just my personal opinion on the fragrance itself.. everyone is different and as we all know... ‚Äútaste‚Äù is very subjective! The funny thing is that, even though I hate it, my 6yr old daughter absolutely loves it! Haha! So it wasn‚Äôt a total waste, cuz she loves it.. she‚Äôs happy so I‚Äôm happy! I just caution anyone thinking about buying this before having smelled it first because it‚Äôs definitely an acquired taste.. you either love love love it or you HATE it!

Cool designed bottle too, cap looking like an old style wire mesh microphone. Another bonus: it doesn't trigger my husband's perfume allergies!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2013
review_body:
I tried this perfume at Macy's before buying it, and I was immediately amazed at how subtle the scent is. I don't like strong perfumes, and it seems like most celebrity fragrances are strong enough to knock you down -- but this one is very light and not overpowering. You have to be very close to smell it. On me, the strongest notes are vanilla and sandalwood.

While this perfume smells amazing on me, it's important to note that individual skin chemistry has a powerful effect on how a perfume smells, so it's a good idea to try it on (and leave it on for a few hours) before making a decision on whether or not you like it.

review_body: I like the scent of this, it's a little fruity but not too much where it feels juvenile. I don't like the shape of the bottle, it's a little awkward to use but the outside is cool with it's heat sensitive design. The scent for me lasted about 3 hours tops and then I'd have to reapply.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
review_body: All of these small perfumes smell like a breath of fresh air. It‚Äôs like nature has hit me but with sweetness. My favorite scent was Happy AF because I feel like it smelled the freshest and cleanest out of the bunch. I could also smell it on my mom from a distance away unlike the other scents. Hyped AF smelled like a mandarin that was a bit toned down and it still had a light scent. It couldn‚Äôt be smelled unless I shoved my arm into someone‚Äôs face and I found that a bit unfortunate. Chill AF smelled sweet but really was the best in capturing a woody scent out of all the perfumes in the box. It had that small spicy smell to it. It was a great blend that captured lots of sweetness but maintained the spicy side. The smell of the scents didn‚Äôt last long and I probably wouldn‚Äôt purchase them because of how light they were. I like wearing things for other people to take notice of the smell and enjoy the smell of it with me. I also felt like the sprayer could‚Äôve been better. It was much too liquid-like and didn‚Äôt have much of a mist when coming out onto the skin. There was a few times the liquid would run down my arm because of how watery it was. I liked each of the scents but they didn‚Äôt really stand out to me.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023

review_body: I like this fragrance, but it is light and doesn't last long, the box is nice and giftable, would be happy to order one for my niece for her birthday, i am sure she is going to like it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
review_body:
Honestly for this being another ‚Äúcelebrity‚Äù fragrance I didn‚Äôt think they were too bad. The names are extremely cringy ‚Äúaf‚Äù, but the scents make up for it. This is just a sample kit so you get to try out the 3 scents and use the bottle as a travel version. The three have their own scents that are pretty distinct from each other.

They all have a musky note to them but Hyped AF has a citrus scent, Happy AF is more floral, and Chill AF is more herbal like. My personal favorite is Hyped, it‚Äôs fresh, citrus, and fruity.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
review_body:
I tend to like light, fresh scents when it comes to perfume and I like this fragrance.

This perfume has a clean, orange-citrus scent that is light. It is described as "woodsy citrus" and truly does have a nice balance (not overly citrus-like). It isn't harsh and I was able to apply immediately after a shower (pores open and no stinging, etc.). The scent lasts for hours, but does fade by the end of an 8-hr day.

The bottle is a simple orange abstract shape that really aligns with the fragrance it holds (simple, not overpowering, with a hint of orange). The spray is even and application is sufficient.

I believe it is a good value for the price. It is more expensive than a body spray, but less expensive than a designer fragrance and that is fitting.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviewer_title: Really like the citrus notes in HYPED. None of the fragrances lasted very long.
review_body:
This is a review of ‚ÄúAddison Rae Fragrance Set by Addison Rae Fragrance - 3 pc Gift Set.‚Äù

This is just a tester set. Each of the fragrances are .05 ounces. I like that the testers are the spray type. However, when I sprayed, I didn‚Äôt always get a mist. Sometimes, I just got drops of fragrance. So spray carefully.

HYPED - I really like the Hyped scent. It was my favorite of all three. This scent has very strong citrus notes which I love. [Listed as ‚Äúmandarin, nectarine blossom, clean musk.‚Äù]

HAPPY - was a little more floral. [Listed as ‚Äúrose, pink lychee, crystalized musk.‚Äù]

CHILL - was definitely a lemon with strong musky. [Listed as ‚Äúred lemongrass, lily of the valley, milky musk.‚Äù]

None of the scents lasted very long. From my experience, they are nice for an hour or two. I applied CHILL just a few hours ago and I can‚Äôt smell it at all anymore.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviewer_title: Scent Is Good. Lacking in Other Respects.
review_body:
I only marginally know who Addison Rae is, but I can definitively say I am not the target market for wearing this perfume. However, I enjoy new scents and have a fear of smelling like an old woman (brought on by my grandma, who wore the same stinky awful scent for years), so I decided to try this out.

This scent is very light and refreshing. It stays on for a bit, but it could certainly last longer. It needs to be reapplied throughout the day.

The bottle is cute, though a bit gimmicky (anyone remember Hypercolor from the early 90s?).

And though I'm not the target market for wearing this, I am certainly (as a middle-aged suburban mom) the target market for purchasing an item like this as a gift for a young woman. When considering the perfume from this aspect, I would point out that though I personally have a mouth like a trucker, it's a little tacky to have the "AF" in the name. If I were considering perfume as a gift for a teen girl, I'd probably go with something a little more classic.

reviewer_name: How'd That Pet Hair Get There
reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
review_body: The best way I would describe the perfume is that it's a very potent youthful floral aroma that would be best worn in well ventilated areas, and or during outdoor activities. I sprayed the perfume in the air, walked through it, and I kid you not, a week later I could still smell the perfume on my clothes when I went to do laundry. By no means did I go overboard when I sprayed it as I only did one click, but by the end of the day I had such a horrible headache. I still think it smells okay, but my senses were definitely overloaded.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
review_body: This smells light and fresh and it's different than other perfumes I've had. The bright color of the bottle makes it easy to find on my dresser.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
review_body:
This set of perfume smells amazing! I like the sample size, I take one on the go. There is one that smells like floral, one that smells clean, and one that‚Äôs more musky. I love them all. Great for all occasions. I want to get the full size of the floral smell.
It smells pretty if that makes sense.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
review_body: I'm really in love with this scent. It's very complimentary and clean.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
review_body: This bottle is really cute and has mood print impression on the bottle. As good as the scent smells it's a bit girly scented like for someone young. The scent isn't as strong but fruity and light. Smells like apples, pears and flowers. The scent is long lasting. The Addison Rae collection has other scents.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviewer_title: Would make a good stocking Stuffer
review_body: This would make a cute stocking stuffer and would give someone a chance to try three different perfumes. The samples are quite small but I do really like two of the perfumes. The chill af perfume is very musky and mysterious but still smells youthful. The hyped af smells florally and sweet and is definitely my favorite. The happy af perfume has a very strong citrusy smell which I do not like, literally smells like you are wearing oranges, not for me at all.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
review_body: I tried this by spraying it on my arm and then periodically sniffing it through the day. It is a light, pleasant citrus type smell. You can definitely smell the mandarin/orange scent, but there is more to it than that too. It is a fairly light scent and wasn't overpowering to me and also didn't give me an instant headache, which is a huge plus because some perfumes bother me, but so far, this one hasn't. I didn't notice the scent as time went by, but if I sniffed my arm, the scent was still there. It is pleasant, though maybe not my personal favorite. I think most people who like an orange-type citrus scent will like it and it would make a nice gift.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviewer_title: Super Citrus Scent But Wears Off Quickly
review_body: I absolutely love trying new fragrances and this sounded perfect for summer. The bottle is super cool. It's completely yellow because it was really hot but it's hyper color like the shirts from the 90's and changes colors from dark orange to yellow when you hold it. It's not alcohol based so when you spritz it comes out in a stream instead of a mist. It does leave some oily residue behind. When you first spray the perfume you get hit strongly with the smell of the blood orange and nectarine. It's very, very orangey but that super strong citrus smell wears off quickly and leaves a light, pleasant orange and lemon smell. I was really hoping once the top notes wore off I would be left with the low, woodsy notes mentioned but I didn't smell any. After an hour I could barely smell it on my wrist. I will still use this for a fun, summer fragrance but it's not a fragrance I would purchase again. If you love the scent of strong, orange perfume this would be perfect for you but it's too one note for me. I prefer more complex fragrances that last longer than an hour.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
review_body: I love this cute compact perfume bottle. The color changes with heat from your fingers which is a fun added bonus. The scent is very good, very musky but still tangerine. I didn‚Äôt think I would like it but it is very refreshing. My biggest complaint is that the smell just doesn‚Äôt seem to stick on me for some reason‚Ä¶I can smell it when I put it on but not much after at times. It is a very beautiful but faint smell. I appreciate the vibrancy of the packaging it is very suitable for the scent, two contrasting scents mixed but in a good way!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
review_body:
This is a very fruity fragrance that smells like a bowl of sweet candy. It‚Äôs very fruity/sweet but you can still grasp the floral aroma (although not as dominate). This comes off as a younger woman‚Äôs fragrance that would typical gravitate towards ‚Äútrendy‚Äù scents in similar price ranges.

The bottle design is very nice, better than a lot of others in this price range. It‚Äôs a matte bottle and cap that easily snaps open/close. I really like the bottle and it‚Äôs color design (maybe more than the fragrance itself). The fragrance overall is good, not a bad fragrance at all. It's too fruity for my preference but a lovely giftable item for the right person.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
review_body:
My bottle arrived yesterday and two things seemed wonderful, the spicy perfume and the color changing bottle (it arrived a bright pink and was soon blueish purple).
The scent is redolent of flowers with a delightful undertone of musky patchouli. I love spicy perfumes, not to sweet or flowery and not like the deep woods. This one is the perfect blend and does, indeed, spark a good mood.
If you are a sporty type who enjoys the outdoors and long walks in the woods or along a raging river you will love this fragrance.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
review_body: This Addison Rae fragrance set comes with 3 sample size fragrances or perfumes. Each fragrance smells good, but these sample bottles won't last very long. Included in this set are Hyped AF, Happy AF, and Chill AF. These would be good for travel or to keep in a purse or bag because they don't take up much space at all.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviewer_title: Soapy, clean and a bit juvenile.
review_body:
This fragrance smells very youthful, soapy and inoffensive.
The presentation is overall rather cheap looking, with the bottle changing colors related to heat, which is the kind of gimmick I expect to be aimed towards a younger crowd.

I really liked the scent, it did stick around for a good 4-6 hours but it doesn't project super heavy or anything.

I could recommend this as a younger girls fragrance.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
review_body: Good edp for girls since its bit on sweeter smelling. It lasts around 4-6 hours, depending on your skin type it can vary. I think its bit on expensive side as well. Not disappointed but not very much happy with scent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
review_body: This Hyped AF by Addison Rae Fragrance - Perfume for Women - Woody Citrus Scent - Opens with Mandarin and Blood Orange - Blended with Pomelo - For Confident, Driven Ladies - 1 oz EDP Spray, is first of all reasonably priced that $40. It has a refreshing scented fruity smell, which is not. I rarely use perfume in general, but I like this fragrance, and the bottle is changing color according to temperature.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
review_body: The scent itself is not bad, that was one thing about this perfume i actually liked! But the bottle looks and feels pretty cheap, not to mention the scent doesn't last very long on the skin. Honesty, this acts more like a body spray than a perfume and I think the price should reflect that.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviewer_title: Leaves a sticky residue on your skin, and it smells like orange juice
review_body: I don't know if I got a bad batch or not, but this stuff is horrible. It smells way too citrusy, and it leaves your skin feeling sticky. I'm starting to think they put orange juice in this stuff with as sticky as it is. The smell it leaves after it sits a while isn't so bad, but my wife had to wash her arms because of how it felt on her skin. I consider myself a perfume/cologne connoisseur, and we've had everything from budget brands at the dollar store to brands as expensive as Creed, so I'd classify this as a something you'd probably buy at Walmart for a teenage girl. I did want to give this at least 3 stars, because it does have a unique smell after sitting for a while. but it's definitely not a perfume for a 37 year old woman. If it weren't so sticky I'd have bumped it up to 4 stars. As far as my recommendations for improvements, I'd drop the price to about $20 and label it for teenagers, then get the formula fixed so it isn't so sticky.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
review_body:
This is a nice perfume.
I gave it to my wife and I must say that I find the scent pleasant.
It does not feel overwhelming and overpowering.
The bottle seems neat as well.
Overall, happy with this product.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
review_body:
The scent is orange essential oil with a hint of lemon mint and cream soda. It is delicious and smells natural.

The ingredients list is short which suggests Addison made an effort to reduce toxic chemicals typical in almost all conventional perfumes.

For an EDP, it doesn't last very long. When your primary fragrance is essential oils, the scent only lasts a couple of hours at most.

My daughter absolutely loves it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviewer_title: nice and fresh, but doesn't last long
review_body:
This smells citrucy and fresh in the beginning, but due to the lack of heavy bottom notes, the effect doesn't last long. Citrucy top notes evaporate within 2-3 hours, and this is no different for this perfume. This is somewhat of a disappointment for a perfume, but also expected from its composition with plenty of citrucy top notes.
Also, about 15-20 minutes after the application, there is a distinct take over of lemon, which unfortunately makes it transiently smell a bit like 'lemon-fresh' scents of various household products.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviewer_title: Sweet floral and fruity fragrance for older kids and teens.
review_body: This has a fruity floral fragrance that smells sweet and youthful. I like how the bottle changes from purple to pink when I touch it. This fragrance doesn‚Äôt last all day and needs to be reapplied to keep the scent going. This is most suitable for preteens and teens. My 8 year old daughter loves this scent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviewer_title: Little Samples that Help You Determine if You Would Like the Full-Size Version ...
review_body:
These three samples are the type you might get with a purchase at a cosmetics/fragrance counter or even at a cosmetics/fragrance shop. The vials are typical sample size and instead of a mist, it comes out as a fast stream (so go easy here).

Sure, it's a little gimmicky, but there is some silly fun here as well. "Hyped" is an overall good scent: it's a little like Tocca Stella, but a little less nuanced and layered. Now, "Happy" is genuinely cheery. There almost seem to be sugary notes here. It's a more layered scent that translates as simple and pretty. And "Chill" is a little basic but in a good way. The Lilly of the Valley really sings here. All fragrances have musk as their base (or "bottom" note).

Since these fragrances are not sold in my area, this was a good way to sample them to see if I wished to order the full-sized versions.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
review_body:
This Addison Rae Fragrance by Addison Rae Fragrance is a nicely packaged set of three sample size fragrances. I'm not that fond of the names, but each one smells very much of the notes listed.
My favorites are Chill and Hyped. Happy is floral, which is okay, but florals are not my favorites. All of the fragrances are very understated, but "pretty" smelling. I have to put my nose right up to my wrists to smell them.
This sampler set is a nice way to pick your new favorite perfume from this brand, and I would recommend it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
review_body: This perfume is very tangerine/citrusy smelling. It‚Äôs nice, but I was hoping for more of the woody scent in the description. It didn‚Äôt seem to last very long.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
review_body: These are very tiny samples. The perfumes smell nice but I didn‚Äôt find them to be very strong scents and I couldn‚Äôt really smell them on myself or get a whiff of the scent while wearing it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
review_body: I was skeptical because I‚Äôm not a huge floral scent person but this is so subtle and soft of a fragrance but yet still so inviting that it has become my new favorite! And the glass bottle that it is in is heat sensitive so when you touch it, it changes colors which is super fun. Very giftable or even to keep for yourself. Will last me a long while. Love!! -wife‚Äôs review

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
review_body: Happy AF is very appropriately named. When I spray it on I get an immediate mood lift. The bottle is so unique and quirky as it changes colors with the heat of your hands. The scent is a fun, fruity floral that is so uplifting and beautiful. It lasts 2-3 hours on me but I don‚Äôt mind reapplying it several times a day to get another boost of happy!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
review_body: Ok I'm not a big perfume person, generally don't wear perfume but I really like this one!! I generally don't wear any because I have kids that have asthma and a lot of strong smells interfere with it but I can put this one on and go right by them and it don't bother them at all!! That's a big bonus in my book!!!! It has a light scent to it just with one squirt. I'm sure it would be stronger with more but that is all I need.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
review_body: The smell of this is light, I definitely feel like it's a younger scent, but I would be comfortable wearing it as an older person too. Perfume is really subjective so difficult to review- but it's not a horrible smell. The bottle is cute, but the spray really comes out a stream.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
review_body: This comes as a set of three tiny spray samples to test out the three fragrances by Addison Rae. All three smell good. I just wish they lasted longer as they start to fade after a couple hours and I prefer perfumes with longevity. If you don't mind having to reapply ever so often, the floral/fruit and musky scents are great for summer.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviewer_title: Happy scent in a unique bottle
review_body:
I love the smell. It's not too weak and also not overpowering. I spray it on my clothes and it has decent staying power throughout the day.
I forget what the fragrance notes are "supposed" to be, but my personal interpretation after just spraying a few minutes ago is citrus, grape, and rose.
Also I have to mention the very interesting bottle. I love it. It's an odd pebble shape covered with a heat-sensitive color changing paint. It's very creative and a joy to the senses.
Overall, I definitely recommend this fragrance if you like bright joyful scents and very unique packaging.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
review_body:
I got the hyped and chill AF perfumes
Both smell awesome! The hyped is an orange citrus clean scent that just smells like summer in a bottle. The chill is a light floral sandalwood beach smell, both scents are light and not over powering and smell great! They last a good while too. The bottles are also interesting and different, they are VIBRANT, and they change color to touch.
Would be a great gift for a teenager or young adult

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviewer_title: Beautiful fun HAPPY perfume! No alcohol formula makes it spectacular!
review_body:
This is delicious and fun as a perfume. I love light citrus florals so this is spot on. I smelled it and said it reminded me of the Happy we know from that cosmetic line, but this is more complex, not a straight citrus but mixed delightfully with rose, peony, and other complimentary ingredients. I love that there is no alcohol and it is a water based product. There is no alcohol tone to the fragrance, with the bright notes popping first. I feel the fragrance lasts a long time, and, at first I did t think one squirt was enough, and added another, and I think it takes a minute for the perfume to hit the skin and start to offer more aroma.

The bottle is really unique too. It changes colors with the heat from touch. My photo doesn‚Äôt show very well, as I‚Äôm in an air conditioned room but this bottle will turn pink if held for long. It‚Äôs fun and I will enjoy putting it out on my dresser. I don‚Äôt often buy perfume, and this feels like a department store line. It‚Äôs certainly impressing me more than most fancy ones. The lack of alcohol as the carrier ingredient makes a huge difference, and the fragrance is sooo much better for it.

This would make a perfect gift, it‚Äôs a lot of fun, and smells good enough I‚Äôll remember to wear it !!! Recommend!!!! Love love it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviewer_title: Flowery Citrus Scent in a Color Changing Bottle
review_body: First off, the bottle is cool. Reminds me to a mood ring in that the bottle changes based on temperature. I feel that is a nice added touch. The fragrance itself is a fruity floral light scent. The scent lasted for about 4 to 6 hours which is good to get through the day.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviewer_title: Smells great on women in my opinion
review_body:
I got this for a woman in my life and she loves to wear it. I think it smells great, but I don't know enough about scents to know how to describe it. I guess the main thing I think of when I smell it is clean, it smells like someone just got out of a nice bath with scented oils in it or something to me.

The bottle it's in is cool, it changes colors where it heats up, so basically when you're holding it your fingers can change its colors. The way it's packaged makes it a great gift, too. All in all this is a good buy and for the price you get a great scent in a bottle that is very cool to see on the shelf.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
review_body: at first wife was not a fan I liked it tho sweet Citrus but as soon as she spray it on her body it changes and she loved it it's Long lasting too after a long day I can Still smell it on her very well

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
review_body:
Several interesting things - it smells great first of all.
It reminds me more of essential oils put together in the just right blend. They feel is like that too - so I'll say that if you put on a lot, you'll feel a teeny bit of oil residue on the skin. But it takes a lot. Some of that is because it has good ingredients.
Next was even with adding more it smelled even better but didn't overwhelm my senses - didn't give me a headache like some perfumes can.
And it smelled different at different points - at first you could smell some of the spicy and some of the bergamot notes, then it shifts to lighter more floral with the lily of the valley and pear blossom.
I really enjoy the scent and found myself delighted in wearing it.
Last thing - the top of the bottle - is heat sensitive. So I couldn't help myself and tried to make patterns just holding it. Neat addition to an already nice product.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
review_body: First thing is the bottle. It is just fun no matter what your age. Every time you touch it, it is a different color. But the smell is fabulous and doesn‚Äôt smell like just another strong perfume. I do not like floral scent of any kind but this doesn‚Äôt give that to me. I am not good at identifying different notes and know that I like a musky scent. This will be my scent for a while as it doesn‚Äôt take much of the spray to attract my attention. It is not overpowering but one squirt in plenty.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
review_body: I think that this smells mostly like oranges. There are some other notes to it that are nice. The smell is all right if you like this kind of scent. As long as you use a little, it isn't overpowering. It did not give me a headache. My biggest issue with it was that it felt weird on my skin. I could feel where I had sprayed it even after it dried. It felt almost sticky. It does wash off easily with soap and water. I'm not a fan of it on my skin but I'll still use it on occasion by spraying a bit on my clothing.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviewer_title: Costly for the size but has great subtle citrus scent
review_body:
Honestly, this product is a bit pricey at $40.00 base cost. The description states it has a woody citrus scent, but I was only able to.smell the citrus scent and nothing woody. I would presume the woody scent was suppose to be almost like a musky wood fragrance. The citrus scent is pleasant and it's very subtle and not one of those overpowering smells.

This bottle of perfume would work great for a person who can't stand to use fragrances that are too strong, over powering. As noted, it is a very subtle fragrance and smells like citrus.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
review_body:
I don't have the scent vocabulary to describe this well. It's flowery and musky at the same time. It's a nice scent. My wife doesn't love it or hate it, but our daughter likes it quite a bit.

The bottle is fun. It changes color like a mood ring. It's a gimmick, but people like gimmicks.

This would make a good gift for a teen.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
review_body:
This Addison Rae Fragrance Set by Addison Rae Fragrance is 3 fragrance samplers in a cardboard sleeve, it arrives inside a bubble wrap bag.

The sampler set allows you to experience all 3 fragrances to see if you like them before committing to a large bottle. I'm not a frequent fragrance wearer so these samplers are perfect for me, I get to try multiple scents for one low price and a sampler is generally enough for the special occasions where I would use a fragrance. The small size is also ideal when traveling.

I was surprised my favorite was CHILL AF, it has a very clean smell. I did not like HAPPY AF as much, it was too floral for me. The HYPED AF was okay, I really could smell the mandarin and nectarine in it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
review_body: The longevity of this fragrance is pretty weak. I stop smelling it within an hour of putting it on. The scent is somewhat reminiscent of the b&bw 90s scent pearberry. It is definitely a tween perfume. The component is cool, but I don‚Äôt think that this perfume is really worth the 40.00 price point.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
review_body: This is a small sample of three different Eau de Parfum (EDP) from Addison Rae. Chill and Happy are both great scents, i can see these for day or evening wear. Overall safe scents. Hyped is just a bit too much lemon, its not offensive but just too strong in the one scent profile. Great buy if you wanna try before buy to a larger purchase.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
review_body:
So I forgot about the color changing bottle feature, and was a little sad when I opened the gorgeous purple and blue gradient box to find a solid baby blue bottle.
The perfume smells AMAZING (I‚Äôm SO sensitive and picky with scents!) so I was still going to rate it highly since that‚Äôs the most important aspect of course. Took it back out of the pretty box to take photos and it was purple and blue!
Realization dawned on me and I held it in the freezer air for just a moment and watched it turn completely purple‚Ä¶ except for where my warm fingers were touching it. üòÑüòçüíôüíúüíô
That was fun.
Absolutely love this scent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviewer_title: Smell is very nice. Awesome touch sensitive bottle
review_body:
The smell of this perfume is very subtle, floral, and feminine. Overall it is a pleasing scent and my husband liked it. Very young and fresh feeling. The bottle fits in your hand very well and has a very neat color changing feature where the bottle changes color where you touch it.

I wasn't a fan of the formatting on the box. They way they used a justified paragraph setting made the packaging look cheap. Should have just centered. The way it is now gives it a knock off/off brand feel IMO.

The product itself inside feels very high end, just wish box looked better.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
review_body:
I love sampler packs like this that let you try different scents out prior to ordering a full size! Especially at this price (5.99 at time of review), you really do get to sample them out. Although they are small, you only need a few sprays. I spray 1 spritz on my wrist and 1 on my neck and it stayed with me for a while! So the small samples will last a little bit!

They all smell amazing!! Chill AF is probably my favorite, but they really all do smell really really good! Definitely going to be ordering a full size bottle of the Chill AF (and the full sized bottles look adorable)!! Super happy with these perfumes!!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
review_body: I am so pleased with Chill AF by Addison Rae. It has a wonderful fresh scent, similar to my favorite BB&W, Gingham Love. The bottle is incredibly cool and unique with the color changing ability based on body heat. It is fun just to play with the bottle. Highly recommend Chill AF, a subtle long lasting scent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
review_body: This perfume really, really smells so good. I was super surprised at how great it smells. It has a hint of vanilla and a citrusy sweet smell. I really like it a lot. I‚Äôve had so many people both men and women comment on how good it smells on me. I rarely get any compliments on other perfumes that I‚Äôve had on but this one, people have actually asked what I‚Äôm wearing. It‚Äôs a great scent. Even my teenaged daughter loves it and took it from me! I would definitely recommend this perfume to everyone I know!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
review_body: So I fully admit, I had to look up who Addison Rae was but I have to say this Gen Z star made an awesome perfume! It has a strong scent that is a unique mix of citrus/ orange and earthy/woody which smells great. The perfume bottle is compact and changes color when you touch it applying heat. It's easy to open and to spray.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
review_body:
I really like all of these perfumes. These are just sample size to try before you buy a large bottle.

They all smell really good and fresh. Chill af is my favorite its a light fresh scent with no extra scents added.

I did notice a light stickiness after use but it wasn't enough to make me not like it, maybe due to an ingredient?
I would buy all of these perfumes in a large size.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
review_body: This scent is phenomenal, smells so good and clean. Perfect for summer. I can‚Äôt wait to buy the other two as well. They have good reviews too. Smells flowery and fresh.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
review_body: The smell is wonderful, it smells fruity but not too sweet but also candy like. It‚Äôs not floral and it wears well throughout the day. It‚Äôs not over powering at all.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
review_body:
This perfume is exactly what I like. It has a nice fruity scent that is not overpowering. This is a perfect summer scent. It actually does really have a calming note to it.

The bottle is fun as well. It is a nice compact size that would be easy to throw in your purse and it is hypercolor. It turns a light blue where I touch it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
review_body: This is gorgeous, the packaging and it is in is just lovely. The color of the bottle is as described. The scent for me is very "fresh" and it read a lot like soap on my skin. I think it left a very clean aroma that I think would work great for those light and airy girls.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
review_body: First, let's talk about the bottle. It has almost a rubber feel, but is heat reactive. My bottle is a bluish purple and changes to a beautiful sky blue color with heat. This perfume smells amazing. It is not strong at all and has a fruity-woodsy smell. It is a great scent for summer. The listed price is great and I would highly recommend this as a gift or personal use.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 26, 2023
reviewer_title: Delightful floral, fruity scent. Smells expensive.
review_body:
I am *very* picky about fragrances, and this one is delightful.

I'd say the description in terms of various aroma notes, and the overall presentation is bright, fresh, and fun. It doesn't smell cloying, sweet or cheap.

If you told me this was an expensive department store perfume I would absolutely believe you.

Also the bottle that it comes in is a very unique and cool design as well. Easy five stars.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
