reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviewer_title: Smell good, a lot of sample for price!
review_body: This is a good price to get a few good days out of these samples! They smell pretty good, though not exactly my normal style. I will say that they don‚Äôt spray very well, like in a mist. They spray out all at once, so that is the main thing that I don‚Äôt like about this. However, if you want to try a new perfume this is great because you have three different smells centered around different moods. Definitely recommend!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
review_body: I like the scent of this, it's a little fruity but not too much where it feels juvenile. I don't like the shape of the bottle, it's a little awkward to use but the outside is cool with it's heat sensitive design. The scent for me lasted about 3 hours tops and then I'd have to reapply.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
review_body: All of these small perfumes smell like a breath of fresh air. It‚Äôs like nature has hit me but with sweetness. My favorite scent was Happy AF because I feel like it smelled the freshest and cleanest out of the bunch. I could also smell it on my mom from a distance away unlike the other scents. Hyped AF smelled like a mandarin that was a bit toned down and it still had a light scent. It couldn‚Äôt be smelled unless I shoved my arm into someone‚Äôs face and I found that a bit unfortunate. Chill AF smelled sweet but really was the best in capturing a woody scent out of all the perfumes in the box. It had that small spicy smell to it. It was a great blend that captured lots of sweetness but maintained the spicy side. The smell of the scents didn‚Äôt last long and I probably wouldn‚Äôt purchase them because of how light they were. I like wearing things for other people to take notice of the smell and enjoy the smell of it with me. I also felt like the sprayer could‚Äôve been better. It was much too liquid-like and didn‚Äôt have much of a mist when coming out onto the skin. There was a few times the liquid would run down my arm because of how watery it was. I liked each of the scents but they didn‚Äôt really stand out to me.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
review_body: Smells great but sadly it doesn‚Äôt last long. Love how the bottle is like a mood ring kind of vibe, if you press down on the bottle itself it changes colors. Very unique, and creative.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
review_body: I like this fragrance, but it is light and doesn't last long, the box is nice and giftable, would be happy to order one for my niece for her birthday, i am sure she is going to like it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
review_body:
Honestly for this being another ‚Äúcelebrity‚Äù fragrance I didn‚Äôt think they were too bad. The names are extremely cringy ‚Äúaf‚Äù, but the scents make up for it. This is just a sample kit so you get to try out the 3 scents and use the bottle as a travel version. The three have their own scents that are pretty distinct from each other.

They all have a musky note to them but Hyped AF has a citrus scent, Happy AF is more floral, and Chill AF is more herbal like. My personal favorite is Hyped, it‚Äôs fresh, citrus, and fruity.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
review_body:
I tend to like light, fresh scents when it comes to perfume and I like this fragrance.

This perfume has a clean, orange-citrus scent that is light. It is described as "woodsy citrus" and truly does have a nice balance (not overly citrus-like). It isn't harsh and I was able to apply immediately after a shower (pores open and no stinging, etc.). The scent lasts for hours, but does fade by the end of an 8-hr day.

The bottle is a simple orange abstract shape that really aligns with the fragrance it holds (simple, not overpowering, with a hint of orange). The spray is even and application is sufficient.

I believe it is a good value for the price. It is more expensive than a body spray, but less expensive than a designer fragrance and that is fitting.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviewer_title: Really like the citrus notes in HYPED. None of the fragrances lasted very long.
review_body:
This is a review of ‚ÄúAddison Rae Fragrance Set by Addison Rae Fragrance - 3 pc Gift Set.‚Äù

This is just a tester set. Each of the fragrances are .05 ounces. I like that the testers are the spray type. However, when I sprayed, I didn‚Äôt always get a mist. Sometimes, I just got drops of fragrance. So spray carefully.

HYPED - I really like the Hyped scent. It was my favorite of all three. This scent has very strong citrus notes which I love. [Listed as ‚Äúmandarin, nectarine blossom, clean musk.‚Äù]

HAPPY - was a little more floral. [Listed as ‚Äúrose, pink lychee, crystalized musk.‚Äù]

CHILL - was definitely a lemon with strong musky. [Listed as ‚Äúred lemongrass, lily of the valley, milky musk.‚Äù]

None of the scents lasted very long. From my experience, they are nice for an hour or two. I applied CHILL just a few hours ago and I can‚Äôt smell it at all anymore.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviewer_title: Scent Is Good. Lacking in Other Respects.
review_body:
I only marginally know who Addison Rae is, but I can definitively say I am not the target market for wearing this perfume. However, I enjoy new scents and have a fear of smelling like an old woman (brought on by my grandma, who wore the same stinky awful scent for years), so I decided to try this out.

This scent is very light and refreshing. It stays on for a bit, but it could certainly last longer. It needs to be reapplied throughout the day.

The bottle is cute, though a bit gimmicky (anyone remember Hypercolor from the early 90s?).

And though I'm not the target market for wearing this, I am certainly (as a middle-aged suburban mom) the target market for purchasing an item like this as a gift for a young woman. When considering the perfume from this aspect, I would point out that though I personally have a mouth like a trucker, it's a little tacky to have the "AF" in the name. If I were considering perfume as a gift for a teen girl, I'd probably go with something a little more classic.

reviewer_name: How'd That Pet Hair Get There
reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
review_body: The best way I would describe the perfume is that it's a very potent youthful floral aroma that would be best worn in well ventilated areas, and or during outdoor activities. I sprayed the perfume in the air, walked through it, and I kid you not, a week later I could still smell the perfume on my clothes when I went to do laundry. By no means did I go overboard when I sprayed it as I only did one click, but by the end of the day I had such a horrible headache. I still think it smells okay, but my senses were definitely overloaded.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
review_body: This smells light and fresh and it's different than other perfumes I've had. The bright color of the bottle makes it easy to find on my dresser.

This set of perfume smells amazing! I like the sample size, I take one on the go. There is one that smells like floral, one that smells clean, and one that‚Äôs more musky. I love them all. Great for all occasions. I want to get the full size of the floral smell.
It smells pretty if that makes sense.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
review_body: I'm really in love with this scent. It's very complimentary and clean.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
review_body: This bottle is really cute and has mood print impression on the bottle. As good as the scent smells it's a bit girly scented like for someone young. The scent isn't as strong but fruity and light. Smells like apples, pears and flowers. The scent is long lasting. The Addison Rae collection has other scents.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviewer_title: Would make a good stocking Stuffer
review_body: This would make a cute stocking stuffer and would give someone a chance to try three different perfumes. The samples are quite small but I do really like two of the perfumes. The chill af perfume is very musky and mysterious but still smells youthful. The hyped af smells florally and sweet and is definitely my favorite. The happy af perfume has a very strong citrusy smell which I do not like, literally smells like you are wearing oranges, not for me at all.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
review_body: I tried this by spraying it on my arm and then periodically sniffing it through the day. It is a light, pleasant citrus type smell. You can definitely smell the mandarin/orange scent, but there is more to it than that too. It is a fairly light scent and wasn't overpowering to me and also didn't give me an instant headache, which is a huge plus because some perfumes bother me, but so far, this one hasn't. I didn't notice the scent as time went by, but if I sniffed my arm, the scent was still there. It is pleasant, though maybe not my personal favorite. I think most people who like an orange-type citrus scent will like it and it would make a nice gift.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviewer_title: Super Citrus Scent But Wears Off Quickly
review_body: I absolutely love trying new fragrances and this sounded perfect for summer. The bottle is super cool. It's completely yellow because it was really hot but it's hyper color like the shirts from the 90's and changes colors from dark orange to yellow when you hold it. It's not alcohol based so when you spritz it comes out in a stream instead of a mist. It does leave some oily residue behind. When you first spray the perfume you get hit strongly with the smell of the blood orange and nectarine. It's very, very orangey but that super strong citrus smell wears off quickly and leaves a light, pleasant orange and lemon smell. I was really hoping once the top notes wore off I would be left with the low, woodsy notes mentioned but I didn't smell any. After an hour I could barely smell it on my wrist. I will still use this for a fun, summer fragrance but it's not a fragrance I would purchase again. If you love the scent of strong, orange perfume this would be perfect for you but it's too one note for me. I prefer more complex fragrances that last longer than an hour.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
review_body: I love this cute compact perfume bottle. The color changes with heat from your fingers which is a fun added bonus. The scent is very good, very musky but still tangerine. I didn‚Äôt think I would like it but it is very refreshing. My biggest complaint is that the smell just doesn‚Äôt seem to stick on me for some reason‚Ä¶I can smell it when I put it on but not much after at times. It is a very beautiful but faint smell. I appreciate the vibrancy of the packaging it is very suitable for the scent, two contrasting scents mixed but in a good way!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
review_body:
This is a very fruity fragrance that smells like a bowl of sweet candy. It‚Äôs very fruity/sweet but you can still grasp the floral aroma (although not as dominate). This comes off as a younger woman‚Äôs fragrance that would typical gravitate towards ‚Äútrendy‚Äù scents in similar price ranges.

The bottle design is very nice, better than a lot of others in this price range. It‚Äôs a matte bottle and cap that easily snaps open/close. I really like the bottle and it‚Äôs color design (maybe more than the fragrance itself). The fragrance overall is good, not a bad fragrance at all. It's too fruity for my preference but a lovely giftable item for the right person.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
review_body:
My bottle arrived yesterday and two things seemed wonderful, the spicy perfume and the color changing bottle (it arrived a bright pink and was soon blueish purple).
The scent is redolent of flowers with a delightful undertone of musky patchouli. I love spicy perfumes, not to sweet or flowery and not like the deep woods. This one is the perfect blend and does, indeed, spark a good mood.
If you are a sporty type who enjoys the outdoors and long walks in the woods or along a raging river you will love this fragrance.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
review_body: This Addison Rae fragrance set comes with 3 sample size fragrances or perfumes. Each fragrance smells good, but these sample bottles won't last very long. Included in this set are Hyped AF, Happy AF, and Chill AF. These would be good for travel or to keep in a purse or bag because they don't take up much space at all.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviewer_title: Soapy, clean and a bit juvenile.
review_body:
This fragrance smells very youthful, soapy and inoffensive.
The presentation is overall rather cheap looking, with the bottle changing colors related to heat, which is the kind of gimmick I expect to be aimed towards a younger crowd.

I really liked the scent, it did stick around for a good 4-6 hours but it doesn't project super heavy or anything.

I could recommend this as a younger girls fragrance.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
review_body: Good edp for girls since its bit on sweeter smelling. It lasts around 4-6 hours, depending on your skin type it can vary. I think its bit on expensive side as well. Not disappointed but not very much happy with scent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
review_body: This Hyped AF by Addison Rae Fragrance - Perfume for Women - Woody Citrus Scent - Opens with Mandarin and Blood Orange - Blended with Pomelo - For Confident, Driven Ladies - 1 oz EDP Spray, is first of all reasonably priced that $40. It has a refreshing scented fruity smell, which is not. I rarely use perfume in general, but I like this fragrance, and the bottle is changing color according to temperature.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
review_body: The scent itself is not bad, that was one thing about this perfume i actually liked! But the bottle looks and feels pretty cheap, not to mention the scent doesn't last very long on the skin. Honesty, this acts more like a body spray than a perfume and I think the price should reflect that.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviewer_title: Leaves a sticky residue on your skin, and it smells like orange juice
review_body: I don't know if I got a bad batch or not, but this stuff is horrible. It smells way too citrusy, and it leaves your skin feeling sticky. I'm starting to think they put orange juice in this stuff with as sticky as it is. The smell it leaves after it sits a while isn't so bad, but my wife had to wash her arms because of how it felt on her skin. I consider myself a perfume/cologne connoisseur, and we've had everything from budget brands at the dollar store to brands as expensive as Creed, so I'd classify this as a something you'd probably buy at Walmart for a teenage girl. I did want to give this at least 3 stars, because it does have a unique smell after sitting for a while. but it's definitely not a perfume for a 37 year old woman. If it weren't so sticky I'd have bumped it up to 4 stars. As far as my recommendations for improvements, I'd drop the price to about $20 and label it for teenagers, then get the formula fixed so it isn't so sticky.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
review_body:
This is a nice perfume.
I gave it to my wife and I must say that I find the scent pleasant.
It does not feel overwhelming and overpowering.
The bottle seems neat as well.
Overall, happy with this product.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
review_body:
The scent is orange essential oil with a hint of lemon mint and cream soda. It is delicious and smells natural.

The ingredients list is short which suggests Addison made an effort to reduce toxic chemicals typical in almost all conventional perfumes.

For an EDP, it doesn't last very long. When your primary fragrance is essential oils, the scent only lasts a couple of hours at most.

My daughter absolutely loves it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviewer_title: nice and fresh, but doesn't last long
review_body:
This smells citrucy and fresh in the beginning, but due to the lack of heavy bottom notes, the effect doesn't last long. Citrucy top notes evaporate within 2-3 hours, and this is no different for this perfume. This is somewhat of a disappointment for a perfume, but also expected from its composition with plenty of citrucy top notes.
Also, about 15-20 minutes after the application, there is a distinct take over of lemon, which unfortunately makes it transiently smell a bit like 'lemon-fresh' scents of various household products.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviewer_title: Sweet floral and fruity fragrance for older kids and teens.
review_body: This has a fruity floral fragrance that smells sweet and youthful. I like how the bottle changes from purple to pink when I touch it. This fragrance doesn‚Äôt last all day and needs to be reapplied to keep the scent going. This is most suitable for preteens and teens. My 8 year old daughter loves this scent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviewer_title: Little Samples that Help You Determine if You Would Like the Full-Size Version ...
review_body:
These three samples are the type you might get with a purchase at a cosmetics/fragrance counter or even at a cosmetics/fragrance shop. The vials are typical sample size and instead of a mist, it comes out as a fast stream (so go easy here).

Sure, it's a little gimmicky, but there is some silly fun here as well. "Hyped" is an overall good scent: it's a little like Tocca Stella, but a little less nuanced and layered. Now, "Happy" is genuinely cheery. There almost seem to be sugary notes here. It's a more layered scent that translates as simple and pretty. And "Chill" is a little basic but in a good way. The Lilly of the Valley really sings here. All fragrances have musk as their base (or "bottom" note).

Since these fragrances are not sold in my area, this was a good way to sample them to see if I wished to order the full-sized versions.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
review_body:
This Addison Rae Fragrance by Addison Rae Fragrance is a nicely packaged set of three sample size fragrances. I'm not that fond of the names, but each one smells very much of the notes listed.
My favorites are Chill and Hyped. Happy is floral, which is okay, but florals are not my favorites. All of the fragrances are very understated, but "pretty" smelling. I have to put my nose right up to my wrists to smell them.
This sampler set is a nice way to pick your new favorite perfume from this brand, and I would recommend it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
review_body: This perfume is very tangerine/citrusy smelling. It‚Äôs nice, but I was hoping for more of the woody scent in the description. It didn‚Äôt seem to last very long.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
review_body: These are very tiny samples. The perfumes smell nice but I didn‚Äôt find them to be very strong scents and I couldn‚Äôt really smell them on myself or get a whiff of the scent while wearing it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
review_body: I was skeptical because I‚Äôm not a huge floral scent person but this is so subtle and soft of a fragrance but yet still so inviting that it has become my new favorite! And the glass bottle that it is in is heat sensitive so when you touch it, it changes colors which is super fun. Very giftable or even to keep for yourself. Will last me a long while. Love!! -wife‚Äôs review

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
review_body: Happy AF is very appropriately named. When I spray it on I get an immediate mood lift. The bottle is so unique and quirky as it changes colors with the heat of your hands. The scent is a fun, fruity floral that is so uplifting and beautiful. It lasts 2-3 hours on me but I don‚Äôt mind reapplying it several times a day to get another boost of happy!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
review_body: Ok I'm not a big perfume person, generally don't wear perfume but I really like this one!! I generally don't wear any because I have kids that have asthma and a lot of strong smells interfere with it but I can put this one on and go right by them and it don't bother them at all!! That's a big bonus in my book!!!! It has a light scent to it just with one squirt. I'm sure it would be stronger with more but that is all I need.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
review_body: The smell of this is light, I definitely feel like it's a younger scent, but I would be comfortable wearing it as an older person too. Perfume is really subjective so difficult to review- but it's not a horrible smell. The bottle is cute, but the spray really comes out a stream.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
review_body: This comes as a set of three tiny spray samples to test out the three fragrances by Addison Rae. All three smell good. I just wish they lasted longer as they start to fade after a couple hours and I prefer perfumes with longevity. If you don't mind having to reapply ever so often, the floral/fruit and musky scents are great for summer.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviewer_title: Happy scent in a unique bottle
review_body:
I love the smell. It's not too weak and also not overpowering. I spray it on my clothes and it has decent staying power throughout the day.
I forget what the fragrance notes are "supposed" to be, but my personal interpretation after just spraying a few minutes ago is citrus, grape, and rose.
Also I have to mention the very interesting bottle. I love it. It's an odd pebble shape covered with a heat-sensitive color changing paint. It's very creative and a joy to the senses.
Overall, I definitely recommend this fragrance if you like bright joyful scents and very unique packaging.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
review_body:
I got the hyped and chill AF perfumes
Both smell awesome! The hyped is an orange citrus clean scent that just smells like summer in a bottle. The chill is a light floral sandalwood beach smell, both scents are light and not over powering and smell great! They last a good while too. The bottles are also interesting and different, they are VIBRANT, and they change color to touch.
Would be a great gift for a teenager or young adult

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviewer_title: Beautiful fun HAPPY perfume! No alcohol formula makes it spectacular!
review_body:
This is delicious and fun as a perfume. I love light citrus florals so this is spot on. I smelled it and said it reminded me of the Happy we know from that cosmetic line, but this is more complex, not a straight citrus but mixed delightfully with rose, peony, and other complimentary ingredients. I love that there is no alcohol and it is a water based product. There is no alcohol tone to the fragrance, with the bright notes popping first. I feel the fragrance lasts a long time, and, at first I did t think one squirt was enough, and added another, and I think it takes a minute for the perfume to hit the skin and start to offer more aroma.

The bottle is really unique too. It changes colors with the heat from touch. My photo doesn‚Äôt show very well, as I‚Äôm in an air conditioned room but this bottle will turn pink if held for long. It‚Äôs fun and I will enjoy putting it out on my dresser. I don‚Äôt often buy perfume, and this feels like a department store line. It‚Äôs certainly impressing me more than most fancy ones. The lack of alcohol as the carrier ingredient makes a huge difference, and the fragrance is sooo much better for it.

This would make a perfect gift, it‚Äôs a lot of fun, and smells good enough I‚Äôll remember to wear it !!! Recommend!!!! Love love it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviewer_title: Flowery Citrus Scent in a Color Changing Bottle
review_body: First off, the bottle is cool. Reminds me to a mood ring in that the bottle changes based on temperature. I feel that is a nice added touch. The fragrance itself is a fruity floral light scent. The scent lasted for about 4 to 6 hours which is good to get through the day.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviewer_title: Smells great on women in my opinion
review_body:
I got this for a woman in my life and she loves to wear it. I think it smells great, but I don't know enough about scents to know how to describe it. I guess the main thing I think of when I smell it is clean, it smells like someone just got out of a nice bath with scented oils in it or something to me.

The bottle it's in is cool, it changes colors where it heats up, so basically when you're holding it your fingers can change its colors. The way it's packaged makes it a great gift, too. All in all this is a good buy and for the price you get a great scent in a bottle that is very cool to see on the shelf.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
review_body: at first wife was not a fan I liked it tho sweet Citrus but as soon as she spray it on her body it changes and she loved it it's Long lasting too after a long day I can Still smell it on her very well

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
review_body:
Several interesting things - it smells great first of all.
It reminds me more of essential oils put together in the just right blend. They feel is like that too - so I'll say that if you put on a lot, you'll feel a teeny bit of oil residue on the skin. But it takes a lot. Some of that is because it has good ingredients.
Next was even with adding more it smelled even better but didn't overwhelm my senses - didn't give me a headache like some perfumes can.
And it smelled different at different points - at first you could smell some of the spicy and some of the bergamot notes, then it shifts to lighter more floral with the lily of the valley and pear blossom.
I really enjoy the scent and found myself delighted in wearing it.
Last thing - the top of the bottle - is heat sensitive. So I couldn't help myself and tried to make patterns just holding it. Neat addition to an already nice product.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
review_body: First thing is the bottle. It is just fun no matter what your age. Every time you touch it, it is a different color. But the smell is fabulous and doesn‚Äôt smell like just another strong perfume. I do not like floral scent of any kind but this doesn‚Äôt give that to me. I am not good at identifying different notes and know that I like a musky scent. This will be my scent for a while as it doesn‚Äôt take much of the spray to attract my attention. It is not overpowering but one squirt in plenty.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
review_body: I think that this smells mostly like oranges. There are some other notes to it that are nice. The smell is all right if you like this kind of scent. As long as you use a little, it isn't overpowering. It did not give me a headache. My biggest issue with it was that it felt weird on my skin. I could feel where I had sprayed it even after it dried. It felt almost sticky. It does wash off easily with soap and water. I'm not a fan of it on my skin but I'll still use it on occasion by spraying a bit on my clothing.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviewer_title: Costly for the size but has great subtle citrus scent
review_body:
Honestly, this product is a bit pricey at $40.00 base cost. The description states it has a woody citrus scent, but I was only able to.smell the citrus scent and nothing woody. I would presume the woody scent was suppose to be almost like a musky wood fragrance. The citrus scent is pleasant and it's very subtle and not one of those overpowering smells.

This bottle of perfume would work great for a person who can't stand to use fragrances that are too strong, over powering. As noted, it is a very subtle fragrance and smells like citrus.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
review_body:
I don't have the scent vocabulary to describe this well. It's flowery and musky at the same time. It's a nice scent. My wife doesn't love it or hate it, but our daughter likes it quite a bit.

The bottle is fun. It changes color like a mood ring. It's a gimmick, but people like gimmicks.

This would make a good gift for a teen.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
review_body:
This Addison Rae Fragrance Set by Addison Rae Fragrance is 3 fragrance samplers in a cardboard sleeve, it arrives inside a bubble wrap bag.

The sampler set allows you to experience all 3 fragrances to see if you like them before committing to a large bottle. I'm not a frequent fragrance wearer so these samplers are perfect for me, I get to try multiple scents for one low price and a sampler is generally enough for the special occasions where I would use a fragrance. The small size is also ideal when traveling.

I was surprised my favorite was CHILL AF, it has a very clean smell. I did not like HAPPY AF as much, it was too floral for me. The HYPED AF was okay, I really could smell the mandarin and nectarine in it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
review_body: The longevity of this fragrance is pretty weak. I stop smelling it within an hour of putting it on. The scent is somewhat reminiscent of the b&bw 90s scent pearberry. It is definitely a tween perfume. The component is cool, but I don‚Äôt think that this perfume is really worth the 40.00 price point.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
review_body: This is a small sample of three different Eau de Parfum (EDP) from Addison Rae. Chill and Happy are both great scents, i can see these for day or evening wear. Overall safe scents. Hyped is just a bit too much lemon, its not offensive but just too strong in the one scent profile. Great buy if you wanna try before buy to a larger purchase.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
review_body:
So I forgot about the color changing bottle feature, and was a little sad when I opened the gorgeous purple and blue gradient box to find a solid baby blue bottle.
The perfume smells AMAZING (I‚Äôm SO sensitive and picky with scents!) so I was still going to rate it highly since that‚Äôs the most important aspect of course. Took it back out of the pretty box to take photos and it was purple and blue!
Realization dawned on me and I held it in the freezer air for just a moment and watched it turn completely purple‚Ä¶ except for where my warm fingers were touching it. üòÑüòçüíôüíúüíô
That was fun.
Absolutely love this scent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviewer_title: Smell is very nice. Awesome touch sensitive bottle
review_body:
The smell of this perfume is very subtle, floral, and feminine. Overall it is a pleasing scent and my husband liked it. Very young and fresh feeling. The bottle fits in your hand very well and has a very neat color changing feature where the bottle changes color where you touch it.

I wasn't a fan of the formatting on the box. They way they used a justified paragraph setting made the packaging look cheap. Should have just centered. The way it is now gives it a knock off/off brand feel IMO.

The product itself inside feels very high end, just wish box looked better.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
review_body:
I love sampler packs like this that let you try different scents out prior to ordering a full size! Especially at this price (5.99 at time of review), you really do get to sample them out. Although they are small, you only need a few sprays. I spray 1 spritz on my wrist and 1 on my neck and it stayed with me for a while! So the small samples will last a little bit!

They all smell amazing!! Chill AF is probably my favorite, but they really all do smell really really good! Definitely going to be ordering a full size bottle of the Chill AF (and the full sized bottles look adorable)!! Super happy with these perfumes!!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023

The bottle is incredibly cool and unique with the color changing ability based on body heat. It is fun just to play with the bottle. Highly recommend Chill AF, a subtle long lasting scent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
review_body: This perfume really, really smells so good. I was super surprised at how great it smells. It has a hint of vanilla and a citrusy sweet smell. I really like it a lot. I‚Äôve had so many people both men and women comment on how good it smells on me. I rarely get any compliments on other perfumes that I‚Äôve had on but this one, people have actually asked what I‚Äôm wearing. It‚Äôs a great scent. Even my teenaged daughter loves it and took it from me! I would definitely recommend this perfume to everyone I know!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
review_body: I like the scent of this, it's a little fruity but not too much where it feels juvenile. I don't like the shape of the bottle, it's a little awkward to use but the outside is cool with it's heat sensitive design. The scent for me lasted about 3 hours tops and then I'd have to reapply.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
review_body: All of these small perfumes smell like a breath of fresh air. It‚Äôs like nature has hit me but with sweetness. My favorite scent was Happy AF because I feel like it smelled the freshest and cleanest out of the bunch. I could also smell it on my mom from a distance away unlike the other scents. Hyped AF smelled like a mandarin that was a bit toned down and it still had a light scent. It couldn‚Äôt be smelled unless I shoved my arm into someone‚Äôs face and I found that a bit unfortunate. Chill AF smelled sweet but really was the best in capturing a woody scent out of all the perfumes in the box. It had that small spicy smell to it. It was a great blend that captured lots of sweetness but maintained the spicy side. The smell of the scents didn‚Äôt last long and I probably wouldn‚Äôt purchase them because of how light they were. I like wearing things for other people to take notice of the smell and enjoy the smell of it with me. I also felt like the sprayer could‚Äôve been better. It was much too liquid-like and didn‚Äôt have much of a mist when coming out onto the skin. There was a few times the liquid would run down my arm because of how watery it was. I liked each of the scents but they didn‚Äôt really stand out to me.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
review_body: Smells great but sadly it doesn‚Äôt last long. Love how the bottle is like a mood ring kind of vibe, if you press down on the bottle itself it changes colors. Very unique, and creative.

review_body: I like this fragrance, but it is light and doesn't last long, the box is nice and giftable, would be happy to order one for my niece for her birthday, i am sure she is going to like it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
review_body:
Honestly for this being another ‚Äúcelebrity‚Äù fragrance I didn‚Äôt think they were too bad. The names are extremely cringy ‚Äúaf‚Äù, but the scents make up for it. This is just a sample kit so you get to try out the 3 scents and use the bottle as a travel version. The three have their own scents that are pretty distinct from each other.

They all have a musky note to them but Hyped AF has a citrus scent, Happy AF is more floral, and Chill AF is more herbal like. My personal favorite is Hyped, it‚Äôs fresh, citrus, and fruity.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
review_body:
I tend to like light, fresh scents when it comes to perfume and I like this fragrance.

This perfume has a clean, orange-citrus scent that is light. It is described as "woodsy citrus" and truly does have a nice balance (not overly citrus-like). It isn't harsh and I was able to apply immediately after a shower (pores open and no stinging, etc.). The scent lasts for hours, but does fade by the end of an 8-hr day.

The bottle is a simple orange abstract shape that really aligns with the fragrance it holds (simple, not overpowering, with a hint of orange). The spray is even and application is sufficient.

I believe it is a good value for the price. It is more expensive than a body spray, but less expensive than a designer fragrance and that is fitting.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviewer_title: Really like the citrus notes in HYPED. None of the fragrances lasted very long.
review_body:
This is a review of ‚ÄúAddison Rae Fragrance Set by Addison Rae Fragrance - 3 pc Gift Set.‚Äù

This is just a tester set. Each of the fragrances are .05 ounces. I like that the testers are the spray type. However, when I sprayed, I didn‚Äôt always get a mist. Sometimes, I just got drops of fragrance. So spray carefully.

HYPED - I really like the Hyped scent. It was my favorite of all three. This scent has very strong citrus notes which I love. [Listed as ‚Äúmandarin, nectarine blossom, clean musk.‚Äù]

HAPPY - was a little more floral. [Listed as ‚Äúrose, pink lychee, crystalized musk.‚Äù]

CHILL - was definitely a lemon with strong musky. [Listed as ‚Äúred lemongrass, lily of the valley, milky musk.‚Äù]

None of the scents lasted very long. From my experience, they are nice for an hour or two. I applied CHILL just a few hours ago and I can‚Äôt smell it at all anymore.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviewer_title: Scent Is Good. Lacking in Other Respects.
review_body:
I only marginally know who Addison Rae is, but I can definitively say I am not the target market for wearing this perfume. However, I enjoy new scents and have a fear of smelling like an old woman (brought on by my grandma, who wore the same stinky awful scent for years), so I decided to try this out.

This scent is very light and refreshing. It stays on for a bit, but it could certainly last longer. It needs to be reapplied throughout the day.

The bottle is cute, though a bit gimmicky (anyone remember Hypercolor from the early 90s?).

And though I'm not the target market for wearing this, I am certainly (as a middle-aged suburban mom) the target market for purchasing an item like this as a gift for a young woman. When considering the perfume from this aspect, I would point out that though I personally have a mouth like a trucker, it's a little tacky to have the "AF" in the name. If I were considering perfume as a gift for a teen girl, I'd probably go with something a little more classic.

reviewer_name: How'd That Pet Hair Get There
reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
review_body: The best way I would describe the perfume is that it's a very potent youthful floral aroma that would be best worn in well ventilated areas, and or during outdoor activities. I sprayed the perfume in the air, walked through it, and I kid you not, a week later I could still smell the perfume on my clothes when I went to do laundry. By no means did I go overboard when I sprayed it as I only did one click, but by the end of the day I had such a horrible headache. I still think it smells okay, but my senses were definitely overloaded.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
review_body: This smells light and fresh and it's different than other perfumes I've had. The bright color of the bottle makes it easy to find on my dresser.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
review_body:
This set of perfume smells amazing! I like the sample size, I take one on the go. There is one that smells like floral, one that smells clean, and one that‚Äôs more musky. I love them all. Great for all occasions. I want to get the full size of the floral smell.
It smells pretty if that makes sense.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
review_body: I'm really in love with this scent. It's very complimentary and clean.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
review_body: This bottle is really cute and has mood print impression on the bottle. As good as the scent smells it's a bit girly scented like for someone young. The scent isn't as strong but fruity and light. Smells like apples, pears and flowers. The scent is long lasting. The Addison Rae collection has other scents.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
reviewer_title: Would make a good stocking Stuffer
review_body: This would make a cute stocking stuffer and would give someone a chance to try three different perfumes. The samples are quite small but I do really like two of the perfumes. The chill af perfume is very musky and mysterious but still smells youthful. The hyped af smells florally and sweet and is definitely my favorite. The happy af perfume has a very strong citrusy smell which I do not like, literally smells like you are wearing oranges, not for me at all.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
review_body: I tried this by spraying it on my arm and then periodically sniffing it through the day. It is a light, pleasant citrus type smell. You can definitely smell the mandarin/orange scent, but there is more to it than that too. It is a fairly light scent and wasn't overpowering to me and also didn't give me an instant headache, which is a huge plus because some perfumes bother me, but so far, this one hasn't. I didn't notice the scent as time went by, but if I sniffed my arm, the scent was still there. It is pleasant, though maybe not my personal favorite. I think most people who like an orange-type citrus scent will like it and it would make a nice gift.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviewer_title: Super Citrus Scent But Wears Off Quickly
review_body: I absolutely love trying new fragrances and this sounded perfect for summer. The bottle is super cool. It's completely yellow because it was really hot but it's hyper color like the shirts from the 90's and changes colors from dark orange to yellow when you hold it. It's not alcohol based so when you spritz it comes out in a stream instead of a mist. It does leave some oily residue behind. When you first spray the perfume you get hit strongly with the smell of the blood orange and nectarine. It's very, very orangey but that super strong citrus smell wears off quickly and leaves a light, pleasant orange and lemon smell. I was really hoping once the top notes wore off I would be left with the low, woodsy notes mentioned but I didn't smell any. After an hour I could barely smell it on my wrist. I will still use this for a fun, summer fragrance but it's not a fragrance I would purchase again. If you love the scent of strong, orange perfume this would be perfect for you but it's too one note for me. I prefer more complex fragrances that last longer than an hour.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
review_body: I love this cute compact perfume bottle. The color changes with heat from your fingers which is a fun added bonus. The scent is very good, very musky but still tangerine. I didn‚Äôt think I would like it but it is very refreshing. My biggest complaint is that the smell just doesn‚Äôt seem to stick on me for some reason‚Ä¶I can smell it when I put it on but not much after at times. It is a very beautiful but faint smell. I appreciate the vibrancy of the packaging it is very suitable for the scent, two contrasting scents mixed but in a good way!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
review_body:
This is a very fruity fragrance that smells like a bowl of sweet candy. It‚Äôs very fruity/sweet but you can still grasp the floral aroma (although not as dominate). This comes off as a younger woman‚Äôs fragrance that would typical gravitate towards ‚Äútrendy‚Äù scents in similar price ranges.

The bottle design is very nice, better than a lot of others in this price range. It‚Äôs a matte bottle and cap that easily snaps open/close. I really like the bottle and it‚Äôs color design (maybe more than the fragrance itself). The fragrance overall is good, not a bad fragrance at all. It's too fruity for my preference but a lovely giftable item for the right person.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
review_body:
My bottle arrived yesterday and two things seemed wonderful, the spicy perfume and the color changing bottle (it arrived a bright pink and was soon blueish purple).
The scent is redolent of flowers with a delightful undertone of musky patchouli. I love spicy perfumes, not to sweet or flowery and not like the deep woods. This one is the perfect blend and does, indeed, spark a good mood.
If you are a sporty type who enjoys the outdoors and long walks in the woods or along a raging river you will love this fragrance.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
review_body: This Addison Rae fragrance set comes with 3 sample size fragrances or perfumes. Each fragrance smells good, but these sample bottles won't last very long. Included in this set are Hyped AF, Happy AF, and Chill AF. These would be good for travel or to keep in a purse or bag because they don't take up much space at all.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviewer_title: Soapy, clean and a bit juvenile.
review_body:
This fragrance smells very youthful, soapy and inoffensive.
The presentation is overall rather cheap looking, with the bottle changing colors related to heat, which is the kind of gimmick I expect to be aimed towards a younger crowd.

I really liked the scent, it did stick around for a good 4-6 hours but it doesn't project super heavy or anything.

I could recommend this as a younger girls fragrance.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
review_body: Good edp for girls since its bit on sweeter smelling. It lasts around 4-6 hours, depending on your skin type it can vary. I think its bit on expensive side as well. Not disappointed but not very much happy with scent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
review_body: This Hyped AF by Addison Rae Fragrance - Perfume for Women - Woody Citrus Scent - Opens with Mandarin and Blood Orange - Blended with Pomelo - For Confident, Driven Ladies - 1 oz EDP Spray, is first of all reasonably priced that $40. It has a refreshing scented fruity smell, which is not. I rarely use perfume in general, but I like this fragrance, and the bottle is changing color according to temperature.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
review_body: The scent itself is not bad, that was one thing about this perfume i actually liked! But the bottle looks and feels pretty cheap, not to mention the scent doesn't last very long on the skin. Honesty, this acts more like a body spray than a perfume and I think the price should reflect that.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
reviewer_title: Leaves a sticky residue on your skin, and it smells like orange juice
review_body: I don't know if I got a bad batch or not, but this stuff is horrible. It smells way too citrusy, and it leaves your skin feeling sticky. I'm starting to think they put orange juice in this stuff with as sticky as it is. The smell it leaves after it sits a while isn't so bad, but my wife had to wash her arms because of how it felt on her skin. I consider myself a perfume/cologne connoisseur, and we've had everything from budget brands at the dollar store to brands as expensive as Creed, so I'd classify this as a something you'd probably buy at Walmart for a teenage girl. I did want to give this at least 3 stars, because it does have a unique smell after sitting for a while. but it's definitely not a perfume for a 37 year old woman. If it weren't so sticky I'd have bumped it up to 4 stars. As far as my recommendations for improvements, I'd drop the price to about $20 and label it for teenagers, then get the formula fixed so it isn't so sticky.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2023
review_body:
This is a nice perfume.
I gave it to my wife and I must say that I find the scent pleasant.
It does not feel overwhelming and overpowering.
The bottle seems neat as well.
Overall, happy with this product.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
review_body:
The scent is orange essential oil with a hint of lemon mint and cream soda. It is delicious and smells natural.

The ingredients list is short which suggests Addison made an effort to reduce toxic chemicals typical in almost all conventional perfumes.

For an EDP, it doesn't last very long. When your primary fragrance is essential oils, the scent only lasts a couple of hours at most.

My daughter absolutely loves it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviewer_title: nice and fresh, but doesn't last long
review_body:
This smells citrucy and fresh in the beginning, but due to the lack of heavy bottom notes, the effect doesn't last long. Citrucy top notes evaporate within 2-3 hours, and this is no different for this perfume. This is somewhat of a disappointment for a perfume, but also expected from its composition with plenty of citrucy top notes.
Also, about 15-20 minutes after the application, there is a distinct take over of lemon, which unfortunately makes it transiently smell a bit like 'lemon-fresh' scents of various household products.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviewer_title: Sweet floral and fruity fragrance for older kids and teens.
review_body: This has a fruity floral fragrance that smells sweet and youthful. I like how the bottle changes from purple to pink when I touch it. This fragrance doesn‚Äôt last all day and needs to be reapplied to keep the scent going. This is most suitable for preteens and teens. My 8 year old daughter loves this scent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviewer_title: Little Samples that Help You Determine if You Would Like the Full-Size Version ...
review_body:
These three samples are the type you might get with a purchase at a cosmetics/fragrance counter or even at a cosmetics/fragrance shop. The vials are typical sample size and instead of a mist, it comes out as a fast stream (so go easy here).

Sure, it's a little gimmicky, but there is some silly fun here as well. "Hyped" is an overall good scent: it's a little like Tocca Stella, but a little less nuanced and layered. Now, "Happy" is genuinely cheery. There almost seem to be sugary notes here. It's a more layered scent that translates as simple and pretty. And "Chill" is a little basic but in a good way. The Lilly of the Valley really sings here. All fragrances have musk as their base (or "bottom" note).

Since these fragrances are not sold in my area, this was a good way to sample them to see if I wished to order the full-sized versions.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
review_body:
This Addison Rae Fragrance by Addison Rae Fragrance is a nicely packaged set of three sample size fragrances. I'm not that fond of the names, but each one smells very much of the notes listed.
My favorites are Chill and Hyped. Happy is floral, which is okay, but florals are not my favorites. All of the fragrances are very understated, but "pretty" smelling. I have to put my nose right up to my wrists to smell them.
This sampler set is a nice way to pick your new favorite perfume from this brand, and I would recommend it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
review_body: This perfume is very tangerine/citrusy smelling. It‚Äôs nice, but I was hoping for more of the woody scent in the description. It didn‚Äôt seem to last very long.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2023
review_body: These are very tiny samples. The perfumes smell nice but I didn‚Äôt find them to be very strong scents and I couldn‚Äôt really smell them on myself or get a whiff of the scent while wearing it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
review_body: I was skeptical because I‚Äôm not a huge floral scent person but this is so subtle and soft of a fragrance but yet still so inviting that it has become my new favorite! And the glass bottle that it is in is heat sensitive so when you touch it, it changes colors which is super fun. Very giftable or even to keep for yourself. Will last me a long while. Love!! -wife‚Äôs review

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
review_body: Happy AF is very appropriately named. When I spray it on I get an immediate mood lift. The bottle is so unique and quirky as it changes colors with the heat of your hands. The scent is a fun, fruity floral that is so uplifting and beautiful. It lasts 2-3 hours on me but I don‚Äôt mind reapplying it several times a day to get another boost of happy!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
review_body: Ok I'm not a big perfume person, generally don't wear perfume but I really like this one!! I generally don't wear any because I have kids that have asthma and a lot of strong smells interfere with it but I can put this one on and go right by them and it don't bother them at all!! That's a big bonus in my book!!!! It has a light scent to it just with one squirt. I'm sure it would be stronger with more but that is all I need.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
review_body: The smell of this is light, I definitely feel like it's a younger scent, but I would be comfortable wearing it as an older person too. Perfume is really subjective so difficult to review- but it's not a horrible smell. The bottle is cute, but the spray really comes out a stream.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
review_body: This comes as a set of three tiny spray samples to test out the three fragrances by Addison Rae. All three smell good. I just wish they lasted longer as they start to fade after a couple hours and I prefer perfumes with longevity. If you don't mind having to reapply ever so often, the floral/fruit and musky scents are great for summer.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviewer_title: Happy scent in a unique bottle
review_body:
I love the smell. It's not too weak and also not overpowering. I spray it on my clothes and it has decent staying power throughout the day.
I forget what the fragrance notes are "supposed" to be, but my personal interpretation after just spraying a few minutes ago is citrus, grape, and rose.
Also I have to mention the very interesting bottle. I love it. It's an odd pebble shape covered with a heat-sensitive color changing paint. It's very creative and a joy to the senses.
Overall, I definitely recommend this fragrance if you like bright joyful scents and very unique packaging.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
review_body:
I got the hyped and chill AF perfumes
Both smell awesome! The hyped is an orange citrus clean scent that just smells like summer in a bottle. The chill is a light floral sandalwood beach smell, both scents are light and not over powering and smell great! They last a good while too. The bottles are also interesting and different, they are VIBRANT, and they change color to touch.
Would be a great gift for a teenager or young adult

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviewer_title: Beautiful fun HAPPY perfume! No alcohol formula makes it spectacular!
review_body:
This is delicious and fun as a perfume. I love light citrus florals so this is spot on. I smelled it and said it reminded me of the Happy we know from that cosmetic line, but this is more complex, not a straight citrus but mixed delightfully with rose, peony, and other complimentary ingredients. I love that there is no alcohol and it is a water based product. There is no alcohol tone to the fragrance, with the bright notes popping first. I feel the fragrance lasts a long time, and, at first I did t think one squirt was enough, and added another, and I think it takes a minute for the perfume to hit the skin and start to offer more aroma.

The bottle is really unique too. It changes colors with the heat from touch. My photo doesn‚Äôt show very well, as I‚Äôm in an air conditioned room but this bottle will turn pink if held for long. It‚Äôs fun and I will enjoy putting it out on my dresser. I don‚Äôt often buy perfume, and this feels like a department store line. It‚Äôs certainly impressing me more than most fancy ones. The lack of alcohol as the carrier ingredient makes a huge difference, and the fragrance is sooo much better for it.

This would make a perfect gift, it‚Äôs a lot of fun, and smells good enough I‚Äôll remember to wear it !!! Recommend!!!! Love love it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviewer_title: Flowery Citrus Scent in a Color Changing Bottle
review_body: First off, the bottle is cool. Reminds me to a mood ring in that the bottle changes based on temperature. I feel that is a nice added touch. The fragrance itself is a fruity floral light scent. The scent lasted for about 4 to 6 hours which is good to get through the day.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviewer_title: Smells great on women in my opinion
review_body:
I got this for a woman in my life and she loves to wear it. I think it smells great, but I don't know enough about scents to know how to describe it. I guess the main thing I think of when I smell it is clean, it smells like someone just got out of a nice bath with scented oils in it or something to me.

The bottle it's in is cool, it changes colors where it heats up, so basically when you're holding it your fingers can change its colors. The way it's packaged makes it a great gift, too. All in all this is a good buy and for the price you get a great scent in a bottle that is very cool to see on the shelf.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
review_body: at first wife was not a fan I liked it tho sweet Citrus but as soon as she spray it on her body it changes and she loved it it's Long lasting too after a long day I can Still smell it on her very well

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
review_body:
Several interesting things - it smells great first of all.
It reminds me more of essential oils put together in the just right blend. They feel is like that too - so I'll say that if you put on a lot, you'll feel a teeny bit of oil residue on the skin. But it takes a lot. Some of that is because it has good ingredients.
Next was even with adding more it smelled even better but didn't overwhelm my senses - didn't give me a headache like some perfumes can.
And it smelled different at different points - at first you could smell some of the spicy and some of the bergamot notes, then it shifts to lighter more floral with the lily of the valley and pear blossom.
I really enjoy the scent and found myself delighted in wearing it.
Last thing - the top of the bottle - is heat sensitive. So I couldn't help myself and tried to make patterns just holding it. Neat addition to an already nice product.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
review_body: First thing is the bottle. It is just fun no matter what your age. Every time you touch it, it is a different color. But the smell is fabulous and doesn‚Äôt smell like just another strong perfume. I do not like floral scent of any kind but this doesn‚Äôt give that to me. I am not good at identifying different notes and know that I like a musky scent. This will be my scent for a while as it doesn‚Äôt take much of the spray to attract my attention. It is not overpowering but one squirt in plenty.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
review_body: I think that this smells mostly like oranges. There are some other notes to it that are nice. The smell is all right if you like this kind of scent. As long as you use a little, it isn't overpowering. It did not give me a headache. My biggest issue with it was that it felt weird on my skin. I could feel where I had sprayed it even after it dried. It felt almost sticky. It does wash off easily with soap and water. I'm not a fan of it on my skin but I'll still use it on occasion by spraying a bit on my clothing.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
reviewer_title: Costly for the size but has great subtle citrus scent
review_body:
Honestly, this product is a bit pricey at $40.00 base cost. The description states it has a woody citrus scent, but I was only able to.smell the citrus scent and nothing woody. I would presume the woody scent was suppose to be almost like a musky wood fragrance. The citrus scent is pleasant and it's very subtle and not one of those overpowering smells.

This bottle of perfume would work great for a person who can't stand to use fragrances that are too strong, over powering. As noted, it is a very subtle fragrance and smells like citrus.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
review_body:
I don't have the scent vocabulary to describe this well. It's flowery and musky at the same time. It's a nice scent. My wife doesn't love it or hate it, but our daughter likes it quite a bit.

The bottle is fun. It changes color like a mood ring. It's a gimmick, but people like gimmicks.

This would make a good gift for a teen.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
review_body:
This Addison Rae Fragrance Set by Addison Rae Fragrance is 3 fragrance samplers in a cardboard sleeve, it arrives inside a bubble wrap bag.

The sampler set allows you to experience all 3 fragrances to see if you like them before committing to a large bottle. I'm not a frequent fragrance wearer so these samplers are perfect for me, I get to try multiple scents for one low price and a sampler is generally enough for the special occasions where I would use a fragrance. The small size is also ideal when traveling.

I was surprised my favorite was CHILL AF, it has a very clean smell. I did not like HAPPY AF as much, it was too floral for me. The HYPED AF was okay, I really could smell the mandarin and nectarine in it.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
review_body: The longevity of this fragrance is pretty weak. I stop smelling it within an hour of putting it on. The scent is somewhat reminiscent of the b&bw 90s scent pearberry. It is definitely a tween perfume. The component is cool, but I don‚Äôt think that this perfume is really worth the 40.00 price point.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 6, 2023
review_body: This is a small sample of three different Eau de Parfum (EDP) from Addison Rae. Chill and Happy are both great scents, i can see these for day or evening wear. Overall safe scents. Hyped is just a bit too much lemon, its not offensive but just too strong in the one scent profile. Great buy if you wanna try before buy to a larger purchase.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
review_body:
So I forgot about the color changing bottle feature, and was a little sad when I opened the gorgeous purple and blue gradient box to find a solid baby blue bottle.
The perfume smells AMAZING (I‚Äôm SO sensitive and picky with scents!) so I was still going to rate it highly since that‚Äôs the most important aspect of course. Took it back out of the pretty box to take photos and it was purple and blue!
Realization dawned on me and I held it in the freezer air for just a moment and watched it turn completely purple‚Ä¶ except for where my warm fingers were touching it. üòÑüòçüíôüíúüíô
That was fun.
Absolutely love this scent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviewer_title: Smell is very nice. Awesome touch sensitive bottle
review_body:
The smell of this perfume is very subtle, floral, and feminine. Overall it is a pleasing scent and my husband liked it. Very young and fresh feeling. The bottle fits in your hand very well and has a very neat color changing feature where the bottle changes color where you touch it.

I wasn't a fan of the formatting on the box. They way they used a justified paragraph setting made the packaging look cheap. Should have just centered. The way it is now gives it a knock off/off brand feel IMO.

The product itself inside feels very high end, just wish box looked better.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2023
review_body:
I love sampler packs like this that let you try different scents out prior to ordering a full size! Especially at this price (5.99 at time of review), you really do get to sample them out. Although they are small, you only need a few sprays. I spray 1 spritz on my wrist and 1 on my neck and it stayed with me for a while! So the small samples will last a little bit!

They all smell amazing!! Chill AF is probably my favorite, but they really all do smell really really good! Definitely going to be ordering a full size bottle of the Chill AF (and the full sized bottles look adorable)!! Super happy with these perfumes!!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
review_body: I am so pleased with Chill AF by Addison Rae. It has a wonderful fresh scent, similar to my favorite BB&W, Gingham Love. The bottle is incredibly cool and unique with the color changing ability based on body heat. It is fun just to play with the bottle. Highly recommend Chill AF, a subtle long lasting scent.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
review_body: This perfume really, really smells so good. I was super surprised at how great it smells. It has a hint of vanilla and a citrusy sweet smell. I really like it a lot. I‚Äôve had so many people both men and women comment on how good it smells on me. I rarely get any compliments on other perfumes that I‚Äôve had on but this one, people have actually asked what I‚Äôm wearing. It‚Äôs a great scent. Even my teenaged daughter loves it and took it from me! I would definitely recommend this perfume to everyone I know!

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
review_body: So I fully admit, I had to look up who Addison Rae was but I have to say this Gen Z star made an awesome perfume! It has a strong scent that is a unique mix of citrus/ orange and earthy/woody which smells great. The perfume bottle is compact and changes color when you touch it applying heat. It's easy to open and to spray.

reviewer_date: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
review_body:
I really like all of these perfumes. These are just sample size to try before you buy a large bottle.

They all smell really good and fresh. Chill af is my favorite its a light fresh scent with no extra scents added.

I did notice a light stickiness after use but it wasn't enough to make me not like it, maybe due to an ingredient?
I would buy all of these perfumes in a large size.

I'd say the description in terms of various aroma notes, and the overall presentation is bright, fresh, and fun. It doesn't smell cloying, sweet or cheap.

If you told me this was an expensive department store perfume I would absolutely believe you.

Also the bottle that it comes in is a very unique and cool design as well. Easy five stars.

review_body: This is a beautiful scent that definitely has a whole lot of uplifting citrus going on.I love a good orange citrus smell and this did not disappoint.It's almost like a peachy, mandarin/orange with a hint of very light spice.It is a cheerful scent and I even had a little bit more pep in my step while wearing. As my blue eyes blossom from its tender graze, it lingers softly, tantalizing my nostrils and putting the ‚Äúinner me‚Äù into a charming state of botanic tranquility.

Not only do I enjoy its invigorating suppleness, which caresses my skin and my hairline, I close my eyes and the uplifting aroma causes my subconscious to unwind. This is my new heavenly scent now!!
